40017015	Dawan, luhpi ra umpira kaiks. Witin lasa prukisa bara pât kasak wauhwisa; aima ailal pauta klauhwanra apia kaka liura kauhwisa.
40017016	Disaipelkam nani ra bri balri, sakuna witin nani sip rakras kan.
40017017	Bara Jisas naku aisan: --Man nani, kasak lukras kyamka kmulwan nani sma ba! Ahkia kat yang man nani wal kamna? Ahkia kat yang kupi man nani wal ban alki takaski bri kamna ki? Tuktika waitna ba nahara bri bal.
40017018	Bara Jisas mita lasa ra laui daukan; bara witin mahka taki wan tukta waitna ba wina. Bara tuktika ba yamni takan baha pyua wina.
40017019	Baha ningkara, disaipel nani Jisas wal tnayara taki aisi, makabi walan: --Nahki kan yang nani spirit saura ba sip kangbi sakras kapri?
40017020	Jisas bila: --Baha ba man nani kasak lukan laka uya apu sma ba mita. Kasak pali mai wisna, mostard ma praiska lupia baku pan kasak lukan laka ba bri bangwma kaka, sip sma naha ilka ra wiaia: 'Naha wina taki, plis walara was'; bara ilka ba wabia. Kasak pali man nani kasak lukisma kaka, diara sut daukaia sip sma.
40017021	[Sakuna nahmuna spiritka na pura sunra bara Gâd ra luki plun wauhwi wal lika kangbi sakaia sip sa.]
40017022	Galili tasbaia ra asla taki bara, Jisas witin nani ra win: --Upla Luhpika waitna ba upla nani mihta ra mangkan kabia,
40017023	bara witinra ikan kabia, sakuna yu yuhmpa ningkara, kli bukan kabia. Naha sturka na disaipel nani walan bara sari pali takan.
40017024	Jisas ai disaipelka nani kira Kapernaum taunka ra wan, tempel lal mana saki kan nani ba Pita ra wih, makabi walan: --Man nani smasmalkrikam ba tempel lal mana aibapisa ki?
40017025	Pita bila: --Au. Bara Pita utla ra diman pyua, Jisas pas witinra aisi muni, win: --Nahki lukisma, Saiman? Naha tasba kingka nani na ani sat uplika nani wina lal mana nani saki sa? Ai uplika nani wina, apia kaka trengsar nani wina?
40017026	Pita mita pana wisata: --Trengsar nani wina. Bara Jisas mita win: --Ban kaka, ai uplika nani lika aibapaia apia sa.
40017027	Sakuna yawan upla kumira sin kupia sauhkaia want apia, baku bamna, man lagun ra was, kyul ba lulki, bara pas inska pibia ba bris. Baha inskika bilara lalah ma kum sakma, bara baha ba aitani kabia tempel lal mana yang aibapaia sna ba bara man mamna sin; brisi baha nani ra aibaps.
40018001	Baha sin pyua ra, disaipel nani ba Jisas lamara bal, makabi walan: --Kasbrika purara ba Kingka lakara ya ba kau tara sa?
40018002	Bara Jisas tuktan lupia kum wini, witin nani lilapas kat mangki,
40018003	win: --Kasak pali man nani ra mai wisni, man nani kupiam laki, tuktan lupia nani baku takras sma kaka, Gâd king aimaki lakara ra dimma apia.
40018004	Baku bamna, Gâd king aimaki lakara ra kau tara ba, bauikira laka bri kabia ba sin naha tuktika lupia na wal baku.
40018005	Bara ani uplika yang nini ra luki nahmuna tuktika kum brisa kaka, yang ra ai brisa.
40018006	"Ya, ya naha tuktika lupia nani yang ra luki na yarka saura lakara kauhwbia kaka, kau pain kabia ai nana ra akbaia walpaia kum wilki, kabu tihuka ra lulkka dimi wabia.
40018007	Tasba mapara nahki saura pali kabia saura daukaia paiwanka nani ailal pali ba mita! Baha pyua bani bara kabia, sakuna ya mita upla walara saura daukaia munan saura dauki ba uplika mapara alai pali kabia!
40018008	"Baha mita, mihtam apia kaka minam kra mita maikan saura lakara kauhisma kaka, klaki dakbi bara, laihwra lulks; kan kau pain sa raya kaiara mihtam apu apia kaka minam apu wih dimma, sakuna ban kaia pata klauhwanra mihtam wal bara minam wal brih mai lulkka lika apia.
40018009	Bara namkra mita maikan, saura lakara kauhisma kaka, daiki laihwra lulks; kan kau pain sa raya kaiara namkra kum apu dimaia, bara namkra wal brih hel pauta ra mai lulkka lika apia.
40018010	"Aman kais; man nani naha sirpika nani kumira sin bahki kulkpara. Kan yang bui man nani ra mai wisna, ai insalka nani Aisiki kasbrika purara bara pyu banira lamara sa.
40018011	[Kan upla Luhpika waitna ba lika tiwan kan ba swaki sakaia balan.]
40018012	"Nahki lukisma man nani? Upla kum syîp 100 brisa bara baha tila ba wina kum aimawahkbia kaka, wala 99 ba il ra swisi, syîp aimawahkan ba plikaia waras saki?
40018013	Bara wal prawbia kaka, kasak pali man nani ra mai wisna, baha syîpka dukyara kau lilia takbia, 99 aimawahkras kan ba purkara.
40018014	Baku sin, man nani kasbrika purara ba, naha sirpiki nani kumi sin tiwbia ba want apia sa.
40018015	"Muihkam mita mampara saura yabia kaka, wal mankam aisi, ai saurka ba latan mariks. Bilam walbia kaka, muihkam ba pât kupia alkram sa.
40018016	Sakuna bilam walras kaka, kau upla kumi apia kaka wal paiws, bara dahra saki aisabia ba, witnis wal apia kaka yuhmpa kaia sa.
40018017	Baha nani ra witin bila walras kaka, serts ra dahra saks; bara serts ra sin bila walras kaka, baha uplika ba swis Gâd kakaira nani apia ba baku takbia Rom ra lal mana aibapaia saki ba baku kabia.
40018018	"Kasak pali man nani ra mai wisni: Dia, dia naha tasba ra wilkma ba, kasbrika purara ba sin wilkan kabia; bara dia, dia naha tasba ra langkma ba, kasbrika purara ba sin langkan kabia.
40018019	"Bara kau sin mai wisna: Naha tasba ra man nani tilam wina wal ai kupia wilin taki, diara kum ai pura suni makabia kaka, Aisiki kasbrika purara ba mita witin nani ra yabia.
40018020	Kan ani anira upla wal apia kaka yuhmpa yang nini ra asla prawbia kaka, yang sin baha ra witin nani lilapas kat sni.
40018021	Bara Pita wih, Jisas ra makabi walan: --Dawan, aima bara muihki mita maipara saura daukbia kaka, yang mita ban swih tikaia sna? Aima 7 kat?
40018022	Jisas witin ra win: --Yang aima 7 lika mai wiras, sakuna 70 aima 7 prais kat.
40018023	"Baha mita, Gâd king aimaki laka ba sin king kum ai warkka uplika nani wal ai traska nani kulki kaikan ba baku sa.
40018024	Mahka baha dauki kan bara, wark uplika kum witin ra brih balan, bamna witinka ba lalah milyan ailal tras bri kan.
40018025	Wark uplika ba aibapaia lalah apu kan, bara king ba mita adar yan witin ba alba baku upla ra atkbia, ai maîa, ai luhpia nani, dia, dia bri ba sut kira, ai traska brikan ba aibapaia dukyara.
40018026	Bara wark uplika ba ai kingka mawan ra ai lula kriki, naku makaban: 'Dawan, wiria bili kaiks, bara sut mai aibapamni!'
40018027	King ba witin ra umpira kaikan, bara traska ba sut ban swin tiwan, pri sin sakan.
40018028	"Sakuna wark uplika ba baha wina takan wal baku, ai pana wala kum wal prawan, baha ba ai tahkia kan; baha mita witinra lalah wiria baman tras kan. Witin mita nana ra alki, mahka pâtka baiki, win: 'Traski ba aibaps!'
40018029	Bara ai tahkia ba ai mawan ra ai lula kriki, makaban: 'Wiria bili kais, bara sut mai aibapamni!'
40018030	Sakuna wala ba bila apia win, bara kau ni wih silak ra mangkan, traska ba taka aibapbia ba kat.
40018031	Wark uplika wala nani ba naha kaikan bara, sari kasak takan, bara wih kingka ra diara takan ba sut win.
40018032	Bamna king ba mita wark uplika ba paiwan balan, bara naku win: 'Wark uplika saurkira! Yang traskam ba sut swih tikri, baku makabram bamna.
40018033	Baku sin man pamnika ra umpira kaikaia kapram, man ra umpira mai kaikri ba baku.'
40018034	Bara king ba kasak ai kupia baiki, adar yan panis munaia ai traska ba sut aibapbia ba kat."
40018035	Bara Jisas naku aisi tnata alkan: --Baku sin Aisiki kasbrika purara ba man nani ra mai munbia, kumi bani muihkam ra kupiam aiska ni traska ban swih tikras sma kaka.
40019001	Jisas naha diara nani na aisin ningkara, Galili wina taki Judia tasbaia ra wan, Jordan awala lalma tanira.
40019002	Upla ailal ai nina blikan, baha ra sikniskira nani ba sut rakan.
40019003	Bara Parisi tila nani Jisas trabil ra dingkaia wisi, lamara bal, makabi walan: --Lâ saki upla kum ai maîa ra swiaia diara bahki tawan?
40019004	Witin pana baha nani ra win: --Man nani Ulbanka ra aisi kaikras ki? Blasi pali papaskra mita witin nani ba 'waitna bara mairin paskan.'
40019005	Jisas naku sin wisata: 'Baha mita waitna ba ai aisika ai yaptika wal swibia, bara ai maîa wal asla takbia, bamna wal ba ai wîna kumi baku takbia.'
40019006	Baku bamna, yakan apia sa, sakuna wal ai wîna kumi takan sa. Baha mita, Gâd mita asla prakan ba, upla mita dakbi sakaia apia sa.
40019007	Bara Parisika nani makabi walan: --Diakan Moses lâ yaban waitna ai maîa ra swiaia wauhkataya ulbi yabi bara, swiaia?
40019008	Jisas bila: --Baha ba man nani kupiam karnika ba mita Moses lâ maikan maîam maka swiaia; sakuna blasi pali lika baku apia kan.
40019009	Yang man nani ra mai wisna, ya, ya ai maîa mairin ra swiaia ba, mairka ba rug laka daukras kan kaka, bara waitna ba mairin wala wal marit takbia kaka, witin marit laka sauhkisa.
40019010	Bara ai disaipelka nani, witin ra win: --Waitna ai maîa wal tanka ba baku sa kaka, kau pain sa marit takaia apia.
40019011	Jisas mita win: --Upla sut naha tanka sip pain briras, Gâd mita naha tanka briaia yan uplika nani ba baman lika.
40019012	Waitna nani sip marit takras tanka ba ailal sa: kum, kum ba ai yapti byara wina marit takaia sip apia ban balan sa; wala nani ba sip apia sa upla nani mita marit takaia sip apia daukan bamna; bara wala nani marit takras ban sa Gâd king aimaki laka ba tawan. Ya, ya naha smalkanka tanka briaia sip kaka, briaia sa.
40019013	Upla kum, kum Jisas ra tuktan lupia nani brih balan, witin nani ra ai mihta nani kahbia bara witin nani dukyara ai pura sunbia win, sakuna disaipel nani mita uplika nani bara mahka laui daukan.
40019014	Sakuna Jisas bila: --Man nani swis tuktan nani ba yang ra balbia, witin nani ba takaskpara; kan Gâd king aimaki laka ba witin nani baku ba uplika nani dukya sa.
40019015	Bara ai mihta nani tuktika nani ra kahban, bara ningkara baha wina mahka wan.
40019016	Wahma kum Jisas ra balan, bara makabi walan: --Smasmalkra, raya ban kaia ba briaia dia dukya yamni daukaia sna ki?
40019017	Jisas pana witin ra win: --Diakan yang ra yamni ba dukyara makabi wali sma? Yamni ba kumi baman bara sa. Sakuna raya ban kaiara diman mai daukisa kaka, lâ nani ba wali dauks.
40019018	Wahma ba bila: --Ani lâka nani? Bara Jisas bila: --'Upla ikpara; marit laka sauhkpara, implikpara; uplikam nina ra kunin aisapara;
40019019	aisikam, yaptikam wal kulks; bara man wînam ra latwan kaikisma ba baku uplikam ra sin latwan kaiks.'
40019020	Wahma ba bila: --Baha sut yang pât daukri wahma ba pana win: Dia ba kau daukaia sna ki?
40019021	Jisas pana witin ra win: --Man kasak pali takan mai daukisa kaka, was, bara dia, dia brisma ba ats upla umpira nani ra yas, bara baku lika kasbrika purara yuya nani bri kama; baha ningkara bal, bara nini bliks.
40019022	Sakuna wahma ba naha walan, sari pali taki mahka wan, witin lalahkira kata bamna.
40019023	Bara Jisas bui ai disaipelka nani ra win: --Kasak pali man nani ra mai wisna, lalahkira kum mapara karna sa Kasbrika purara ba Kingka lakara dimaia.
40019024	Kau sin mai wisna: Kyamil kum silak nakra bak dimi luaia ba kau isi kabia, lalahkira kum Gâd king aimaki ba lakara dimaia ba wal.
40019025	Disaipel nani baha walan bara, kasak ta iwan, bara pana, pana makabi wali bangwi kan: --Baku bara ya sip swaki sakan kabia ki?
40019026	Jisas witin nani ra kaiki si, win: --Upla nani naha na daukaia sip apia sa, sakuna Gâd lika diara sut daukaia sip sa.
40019027	Bara Pita mita witin ra win: --Dawan, yang nani dia, dia bri kapri ba sut swisi, ninam bliki sna. Baku bamna, yang nani dia brimna ki?
40019028	Jisas witin nani ra win: --Man nani ra kasak pali mai wisna, upla takan ba ai king iwaika pranakira ra iwbia bara, diara nani sut raya daukan kabia pyua ra, upla luhpia waitna ai iwaika pranakira iwbia bara man nani nini blikram ba sin king iwaika 12 nani ra iwma, Israel kyamka 12 ba lâka daukaia dukyara.
40019029	Bara ya, ya ai watla nani, ai muihni nani, ai lakra nani, ai aisa, ai yapti, ai maîa mairin, ai luhpia nani, ai tasbaia nani sut yang taiwan swin nani ba, 100 prais kau bribia bara raya ban kaia ba sin witin nani dukya kabia.
40019030	Sakuna upla ailal nana ra taura aimaki nani ba, nina ra taui bangwbia; bara ailal nana ra nina ra bangwi ba, taura taui bangwbia.
40020001	"Gâd king aimaki laka ba insla dawanka kum baku sa; witinka titan pali taki wan wark tatakra nani ra wark yabaia, ai wainka nasla ra wark takaia.
40020002	Wark tatakra nani ba aikuki aisi daukan yu kum ra nahki aibapaia ba yabaia, bara baha nani ai nasla ra wark takaia blikan wan.
40020003	Baha ningkara, titan 9 aklak kli taki wan, bara diara atkaia pliskara, witin nani bahki baman baha ra kan.
40020004	Witin baha nani ra win: 'Man nani sin naisla ra wark takaia was, bara nahki prais briaia kama ba, yang maikamna.' Bamna witin nani wan.
40020005	Dawanka kli 12 aklak prais taki wan, tutni 3 aklak sin, bara sin sat daukan.
40020006	Bara tutni 5 aklak kli pulaia pliskara baha ra wala nani bahki diara daukras kan aikuki prawan, bamna baha nani ra win: 'Diakan man nani nahara wark takras bahki baman sma?'
40020007	Witin nani pana win: 'Upla kumi sin wark takaia wankras ba mita.' Bara witin baha nani ra win: 'Man nani sin naisla ra wark takaia was.'
40020008	"Tihmia iwan bara, insla dawanka ba wark pura kakaira ra win: 'Wark tatakra nani ba paiwi, ai mana ba yas; las ra balan ba wina aibaps, taura balan ba las ra aibaps.'
40020009	Bara tutni 5 aklak wark takaia diman nani ba balan, bara kumi bani ai mana brin, yu aiska mana dia aibapi kan ba.
40020010	Ningkara, pas pali wark takaia diman nani ba balan, bara luki bangwan kau pura ai mana bribia; sakuna witin nani sin kumi bani dia yu aiskara aibapi kan ba praiska kat brin.
40020011	Witin nani baha brin bara, dawanka ba mapara mahka brukwan,
40020012	nan aisi: 'Naha nani balan na awar kumi baman wark takan; bara yang nani kau wark karna takri yu aiska lapta wal aimaki na wal baku sin mana yabram.'
40020013	Sakuna dawanka ba mita baha nani tila wina kumira pana win: 'Uplika, yang man ra wataui kumi sin mai munras. Man yang wal lâ daukras katma ki yu aiska wark takaia mana ba?
40020014	Mamna brih, mahka was. Yang man ra maikisna ba baku naha waitnika tutnira wark ra diman nara sin yabaia sna.
40020015	Yang lalahki ba wal dia want sna ba kat daukaia sip apia sna ki? Apia kaka yang kupi pain bara, man tumisma ki?'
40020016	"Baku bamna, ya nani nina ra ba, taura taubia, bara taura nani ba nina ra taubia.
40020017	Jisas Jerusalem ra pât impaki kan bara, ai disaipelka 12 ba tnayara saki, win:
40020018	Man nani kaikisma yawan Jerusalem ra auya, baha ra sika Upla Luhpika waitna ba prîst wihtka nani bara lâ smasmalkra nani mihta ra mangkan kabia, bara witin nani mita pruaia pâtka ra dingkbia,
40020019	Ju apia nani mihta ra mangkbia witin swira daukaia mata, prukbia bara dus prihni ra sabia; sakuna yu yuhmpa ra, pruan wina kli bukan kabia.
40020020	Jems bara Jan, Sebedi luhpia nani ba, ai yaptika aikuki balan, bara mairka ba Jisas lamara ai lula krikan diara kum makaban.
40020021	Jisas makabi walan: --Man dia ba pliki sma? Witin bila: -- Man King aimakma bara, bara adar yas luhpi wal na wina kumi ba aihkikam ra iwbia, bara wala ba smihkam ra.
40020022	Jisas witin nani ra win: --Man nani kaikras sma dia makabisma ba. Man nani sip sma ki yang dimna kapka ba wina diaia? Witin nani win: --Sip sna.
40020023	Jisas pana aisin: --Kasak. Man nani kapki wina dima, sakuna aihkiki ra bara smihki ra iwaia ba lika yang mita yabaia sip apia. Baha lika ya, ya dukya wisi Aisiki ridi daukan ba, baha nani ra yaban kabia.
40020024	Disaipel wala nani 10 ba baha walan bara, muihni wal ba mapara lauan.
40020025	Sakuna Jisas baha nani ra paiwi, win: --Man nani kaikisma, kuntri nani wihtka nani ba baha nani purara dawanka takisa, bara witin nani tilara kau tara nani ba baha nani purara karnika alkisa.
40020026	Sakuna man nani tilamra lika baku kabia apia. Bamna man nani tilamra ya tara kaia lukisa kaka, wala nani dukya daukaia sa;
40020027	bara ya, ya man nani tilam taura kaia lukisa kaka, wala nani albika takaia sa.
40020028	Bahamna, baku natkara, upla luhpia waitna ba balras kan upla mita witin ai dukia daukaia dukyara, sakuna witin mita upla dukia daukaia, bara ai rayaka ba upla ailal pri sakaia mana baku yabaia.
40020029	Witin nani Jeriko taunka wina taki auya kan bara, upla ailal Jisas nina blikan.
40020030	Baha ra yabal tnayara blain wal iwi kan; bara Jisas lui auya kan ba walan bara, naku winan: --Dawan, Debit luhpia, yang nani ra umpira ai kaikram!
40020031	Upla nani ba mita laui daukan ai bila ba prakbia wisi, sakuna witin nani kau karna winan: --Dawan, Debit luhpia, yang nani ra umpira ai kaiks!
40020032	Bara Jisas takaski, blain nani ba paiwi, makabi walan: --Man nani dia want sma yang mai daukamna?
40020033	Witin nani bila: --Dawan, yang nani kaikaia want pali sna.
40020034	Bara Jisas mita witin nani ra umpira kaikan, bamna nakra nani ra kangban. Baha sin pali pyua ra blain nani ba kaikaia sip kan, bara Jisas nina blikan.
40021001	Witin nani Jerusalem lamara balan bara, Bitpadsi taunka lamara balan, Alibit ilka lamara. Baha ra Jisas ai disaipelka wal saki blikan wan,
40021002	bara naku win: --Taun lupia mamwan kat bara was. Baha ra beriku mairin kum wilkan bara sakma, bara ai luhpia sin witin wal. Man nani langki, sal aik.
40021003	Bara ya, ya diara kum mai wibia kaka, naku wis: Dawan naha nani na brin daukisa, bara naika bri balbia.
40021004	Naha na ban takan, dahra aisasara ulban ba aimakaia kan:
40021005	"Man nani Saion taunka ra wis: 'Kais, Kingkam ba man ra aula, bauikira pali, beriku kum purara uli, beriku luhpia sin, baha ba wark daîwra luhpia kum.' "
40021006	Bamna disaipel nani wan, bara Jisas win ba baku daukan.
40021007	Beriku ba ai luhpia wal bri balan, bara ai kwalka nani baha purara palkan, Jisas ulan.
40021008	Upla ailal ba ai kwalka nani yabal ra palkan; wala nani dus tnawa nani klaki, yabal ra yakaban.
40021009	Upla nani taura wapi kan ba bara nina ra aula kan ba sin kwara tara kan bara mahka naku winan: --King Debit Luhpia ra Prana Tara Kabia! Yamni pali sa witin Dawan nina maki aula ba! Gâd ra prana kabia lai purara!
40021010	Jisas Jerusalem ra diman bara, taun aiska ba turban pali takan, bara upla ailal makabi walan: --Naha na ya?
40021011	Bara upla nani ba bila: --Naha na dahra aisasara Jisas, Galili tasbaia ra Nasaret taunka ba wina.
40021012	Jisas tempel ra diman bara baha wina upla nani diara atki pana atki ba sut kangbi sakan, upla lalahka sins mamunra nani tebilka nani ba sut makupan, bara butku aiâtkra iwaika nani ba sin;
40021013	bara baha nani ra naku win: --Ulbankara wisa: 'Yang waitla ba pura sunra watla win kabia'; sakuna man nani aîmplikra nani watla daukram sa.
40021014	Bara tempel ra blain nani kum, kum bara skahwa nani sin Jisas lamara balan, bara witin mita sut rakan.
40021015	Sakuna prîst wihtka bara lâ smasmalkra nani lauan sain nani aihka daukan ba kaiki, bara tuktan nani tempelka naku wini kan ba walan: "King Debit Luhpia ra Prana Tara Kabia!"
40021016	Bara witin nani Jisas ra win: --Wali sma ki baha nani aisi ba? Jisas pana win: --Au, yang walisna. Sakuna Ulbankara naha tanka aisi ba man nani aisi kaikras ki? Naku wisa: 'Tukta sirpi swap lupia tyala dî nani lawana ba wal man ra mamyunaia ba yaram sa.'
40021017	Bara Jisas baha nani swisi, taun ba wina taki, Betania ra wih, baha ra tihmia luan.
40021018	Yu wala titan, kli taun ra aula kan bara, Jisas plun pin dauki kan.
40021019	Yabal tnayara witin kwah damni dusa kum kaikan, sakuna dusa ra diara kumi sin sakras, wahya nani baman. Bara Jisas dusa ra win: --Ban kaiara man kli ma brima apia! Baha sin pali pyua ra, kwah damni dusa ba lawan.
40021020	Disaipel nani baha kaikan bara, ta iwan, bara Jisas ra makabi walan: --Nahki kan kwah damni dusa ba baha pali pyua ra lawan?
40021021	Jisas witin nani ra win: --Kasak pali man nani ra mai wisna, kasak lukan laka brih, nahmpa nahmpa lika lukras sma kaka, kwah damni dusa ra daukri na man nani daukma; bara naha baman apia, sakuna naha ilka ra sin wima: 'Naha wina taki, kabu ra wih dims', bara baku takbia.
40021022	Bara man nani kasak luki puram sunra ra makama ba, sut brima.
40021023	Jisas tempel ra diman, bara baha ra smalki kan, prîst wihtka nani bara Ju wihtka almuk nani ai lamara balan, bara witinra makabi walan: --Dia karnika ni naha dukya nani daukisma? Ya mita naha karnika na maikan?
40021024	Jisas witin nani ra win: --Yang sin man nani ra diara kum mamkabi walaisna; baha ba ai wima kaka, yang man nani ra mai wimna dia karnika ni naha dukya nani daukisna ba.
40021025	Ya mita Jan ra upla tahbi daukaia blikan? Gâd, apia kaka, upla nani mita? Sakuna witin nani mahka pana, pana blahwi, aisan: "Yawan na Gâd blikan wibia kaka, witin wan wibia: 'Bara diakan man nani witinra kasak lukras kapram?'
40021026	Bara upla nani mita blikan wibia kaka, yawan upla nani ra sibrin wan daukisa; kan upla sut kasak lukisa Jan ba Gâd dahra aisasara kan."
40021027	Baku bamna, witin nani Jisas ra win: --Yang nani kaikras. Bara Jisas bila: --Baku bara yang sin man nani ra mai wimna apia dia karnika ni naha dukya nani daukisna ba.
40021028	Jisas makabi walan: --Naha na man nani nahki lukisma ki? Waitna kum luhpa waitna wal bri kan, bara kumira naku win: 'Luhpi, man naiwa wainki nasla ra wark takaia was.'
40021029	Luhpia ba bila: 'Yang wamna apia!' Sakuna naika mapara ai lukanka sins munan, bara wark takaia wan.
40021030	Baha ningkara, aisa ba ai luhpia wala bara bal, sin bila wisata. Naha bila lika: 'Au, aisa, yang wamna!' Sakuna witin waras.
40021031	Wal ba wina ani ba ai aisa want kan ba kat daukan? --Witin nani pana win: --Pas ba. Bara Jisas witin nani ra win: --Man nani ra kasak pali mai wisna, lal mana saki Rom ra yabi nani ba, bara rug mairin nani ba sin man nani kainamra Gâd king aimaki tasbaia ra dimbia.
40021032	Kan Jan Tatahbra ba man nani ra mai smalki balan nahki iwaia sma ba, sakuna man nani witinra kasak lukras katma; sakuna lal mana saki nani bara rug mairin nani lika witinra kasak lukan. Man nani naha kaikram, sakuna kupiam laki bangwras witinra kasak lukaia dukyara.
40021033	"Man nani maprika lilka wala na wals: Insla dawanka kum ai nasla ra wain dusa ma nani mangkan; bara klar kum kutban, wain laya taibi sakaia untika kum sahlkan, bara tawar sin kum paskan diara ba sut aihwakaia dukyara. Ningkara, nasla ba wark tatakra nani mihta ra mangki si, witin plis ra impakan.
40021034	Dakaia pyua balan pyua, ai albika kum, kum blikan nasla ma wina ai sirka ba wark tatakra nani ra makabaia dukyara.
40021035	Sakuna wark tatakra nani mita albika nani ba alki, kumira lika prukan, walara ikan, bara walara lika walpa ni saban.
40021036	Dawanka ba kainara blikata purkara kau alba nani blikan; sakuna warkka tatakra nani sut ra sim sat munan.
40021037	"Las pali kat ai luhpia waitna pali ba blikan, naku luki: 'Witin nani luhpi ra kulkanka yabi kabia.'
40021038	Sakuna wark tatakra nani ba luhpia ba kaikan bara, ai manka naku aisan: 'Naha sika diara nani na dawanka kabia; kaisa witin ba ikaia, bara diara nani na yawan briaia.'
40021039	Baku bamna, witin ba alki, nasla ba wina saki, ikan.
40021040	Bara Jisas makabi walan: --Bamna nasla dawanka ba balbia bara, baha warkka tatakra nani ra dia munbia?
40021041	Witin nani bila: --Baha waitnika saura nani ra umpira kaikras pali sut ikbia, bara nasla ba wark tatakra wala nani mihta ra mangkbia, bara baha nani lika dakaia pyua ra ai nasla mana ba witinra yabia.
40021042	Bara Jisas witin nani ra win: --Man nani Ulbanka ra kau aisi kaikras ki? Naku ulban sa: 'Walpa na utla mamakra nani mita walpa lulki swin ya ba, baha pali sika raya wihtka takan ba. Naha na Dawan mita daukan sa, bara yang nani aihka tai iwi bangwri sa.'
40021043	Baha mita, man nani ra mai wisna, Gâd king aimaki laka ba man nani mihtam wina dakbi, upla nani king tasbaia ma saki nani ra yaban kabia.
40021044	Bara ya, ya walpa ba purara kauhwbia kaka, pis, pis ra kriwbia, bara walpaia ba upla kum purara kauhwbia kaka, witinka yuya baman daukbia.
40021045	Prîst wihtka nani bara Parisi nani sin Jisas maprika lilka nani aisi ba walan bara, ai dara walan baha ba witin nani dukyara aisi kan.
40021046	Bamna witin nani Jisas ra alkaia lukan, sakuna upla nani ra sîbri kan, kan upla nani kasak kulkan Jisas ba Gâd dahra aisasara kan.
40022001	Jisas upla nani ra kli maprika lilka nani wala aisi, win:
40022002	"Gâd king aimaki laka ba lika king kum ai luhpia waitna marit takan bara lilia tara kum daukan ba baku sa.
40022003	Ai albika nani blikan, paiwan uplika nani ba marit patara balbia wiaia, sakuna witin nani balaia apia win.
40022004	Alba wala nani blikan, naku wisi: 'Paiwan uplika nani ra wis, plun ba pât ridi sa. Bipki nani bara daîwra batanira nani pât ikri, bara diara sut ridi sa; man nani marit patara bal.'
40022005	Sakuna paiwan uplika nani lika bila walras. Kum ba ai nasla ra wan, wala ba ai bisniska ra,
40022006	wala nani ba lika king albika nani ba alki rausauhki, ikan.
40022007	Bara king ba kasak pali ai kupia baikan, bamna ai suldawa nani blikan baha upla aîkra nani ba iki tikaia, bara ai taunka ba sin angkka luaia.
40022008	Baha ningkara, ai albika nani ra win: 'Marit pata ba pât ridi sa, sakuna paiwri uplika nani ba lika balaia aitani apia kan.
40022009	Bamna man nani yabal tara nani ra was, bara ya, ya wal prawma ba sut marit patara paiws.'
40022010	Alba nani ba yabal nani ra taki wan, bara upla sakan ba sut asla daukan, upla saura nani bara yamni nani sin; bara baku watla ba upla baman bangki takan.
40022011	"King ba paiwan uplika nani kaikaia diman, bara witin waitna kum kaikan marit patara dimaia kwalka ba dimras kan.
40022012	Bara witinra win: 'Uplika, nahki kan man marit kwalka dimras si nara ban bal dimram?' Sakuna wala ba diara kumi sin aisaras.
40022013	Bamna king ba tebil mangki kan nani ra win: 'Mina nani bara mihta nani ba priski, lata tihmu tara ra lulks; baha ra sika witin inbia, bara ai napa nani sin arkbia.'
40022014	Kan upla ailal lika paiwan sa, sakuna kum, kum baman bak sakan sa."
40022015	Parisi nani ba mahka wan, bara ai laka daukan Jisas ra munka diara aisabia bara, dahra sakaia dukyara.
40022016	Bara ai uplika tila nani, Herad uplika nani kira blikan Jisas ra wiaia: --Smasmalkra, yang nani pain kaiki sna man ba kasak kat aisisma, bara upla nani aisi ba kulkras Gâd yabalka ba kat kasak smalkisma, kan man ba upla mawan ka ba man kulkras sma bamna.
40022017	Bamna nahki lukisma ba yang nani ra ai wis: Rom wihtka tara ra lal mana aibapaia ba, aitani sa apia kaka?
40022018	Sakuna Jisas witin nani lukanka saura ba pât kaikan, bara wisata: --Kuninkira nani, dia muni traiki kaikisma?
40022019	Lal mana aibapi lalahka kum sal ai mariks. Bara lalah ma kum sal yaban.
40022020	Baha kaiki, Jisas witin nani ra makabi walan: --Lilka na bara nina ulban na sin ya dukya saki?
40022021	Witin nani bila: --Wihta tara dukya. Bara Jisas bila: --Ban kaka, wihta tara dukya ba wihta tara ra yas, bara Gâd dukya ba Gâd ra yas.
40022022	Naha walan bara, witin nani ta iwan; bamna witin ba swisi, witin nani mahka wan.
40022023	Baha sin yua, Sadyusi kum, kum Jisas ra kaikaia wan. Sadyusi nani wisa pruan nani ba lika kli sip bubia apia; bamna naha tanka na Jisas ra makabi walan:
40022024	Smasmalkra, Moses wan win marit waitna kum luhpa sakras ban prubia kaka, muihnika ba ai pyarkika ba wal brih, luhpa nani sakaia sa ai muihni pruan ba watlika ra.
40022025	Bamna, nahara yang nani tilira waitna 7 kan, sut ai muihni atia. Kau almukka ba marit takan, sakuna pruan. Luhpa sakras ban pruan bamna, ai pyarkika ba ai muihni ai ningkara bara swin.
40022026	Baha ningkara, witin ningka, bara sin baku takan, ba wina wala ba brin bara sin baku takan; bara baku baman, muihnika 7 kat brin.
40022027	Sut pruan ningkara, mairka ba sin pruan.
40022028	Bamna pruan wina kli bubia bara, 7 baha wina ani pali ba maîa kabia, kan sut witin wal marit ba?
40022029	Jisas pana aisin: --Man nani lika tanis mamwaki sma, man nani sin Ulbanka ba tanka briras, Gâd karnika ba sin kaikras sma ba mita.
40022030	Pruan nani kli bubia bara, witin nani marit takbia apia, ai luhpia mairin nani sin marit sakbia apia, kan witin nani ba lika Gâd insalka nani kasbrika purara ba baku kabia.
40022031	Sakuna pruan nani kli buaia tanka ba dukyara lika, Gâd pali mita man nani ra mai win ba kau aisi kaikrasma ki? Naku wisa:
40022032	'Yang sika Ebraham, Aisak bara Jekob Gâdka.' Bara Gâd ba pruan nani Gâdka apia sa, sakuna raya nani Gâdka sa!
40022033	Upla nani naha walan bara, ai smalkanka ba dukyara ta iwan.
40022034	Jisas Sadyusi nani ba bilas daukan ba Parisi nani kyama ra diman bara, sut asla takan;
40022035	bara tila ba wina, lâ smasmalkra kum Jisas ra traika kaikan. Witinra makabi walan:
40022036	Smasmalkra, lâ bila nani ba wina ani ba kau tara saki?
40022037	Jisas bila: --'Dawan Gâdkam ra latwan kaikma, kupiam aiskakira, solkam aiskakira sinskam aiskakira ni sin.'
40022038	Naha sika lâ bila nani wina kau tara bara kau taura ba sin.
40022039	Wala kumi baha wal talya ba lika, naku wisa: 'Uplikam ra latwan kaiki man winam baku uplikam ra sin latwan kaiks.'
40022040	Naha lâ bila wal nara Moses lâka bara dahra aisasara nani smalkanka nani ba asla prawan sa.
40022041	Kau Parisi nani asla kan bara,
40022042	Jisas mita witin nani ra makabi walan: --Misaia dukyara man nani nahki lukisma? Witin ba ya kyamka sa? Witin nani bila: --Debit kyamka.
40022043	Bara Jisas witin nani ra win: --Nahki kan Spirit Hulikira ingnika yan ba mita, Debit mita Dawan makan? Kan Debit naku aisan:
40022044	'Dawan ba yang Dawankira win: Mihti aihkika ra iws, Yang mita man waihlam nani minam munhta ra, mangkamna kat.'
40022045	Nahki Kraist ba Debit kyamka kabia ki, kan Debit pali mita Dawan maki ba?
40022046	Bara upla kumi sin bila kum pan aisaras kan; bamna baha yua wina upla kumi sin diara makabi walaia lukras kata.
40023001	Naha ningkara Jisas upla nani ra bara ai disaipelka nani ra wisata:
40023002	"Lâ smasmalkra nani bara Parisi nani sin Moses lâka tanka pliki marikaia karnika brisa.
40023003	Baku bamna, man nani bila walan, dia daukma mai wibia ba sin dauks; sakuna ai daukanka saura nani ba nina blikpara, kan witin nani dia smalki ba kat daukras, diara wala baman daukisa.
40023004	Witin nani karban wihra nani wilki, upla nani pahpaiara sunisa, bara baha twilkaia ba karna pali sa, sakuna witin nani lika ai mihta sirpi kumi ni sin kangban daukras.
40023005	Diara dauki bani ba upla nani kaikbia wisi daukisa. Witin nani ai wauhkataya watla nani ba tara brisa, ai kwalka un nani ba sin tara daukisa.
40023006	Plun piaia nani ra plis kau pain nani ba plikisa, bara prias watla nani ra sin taura iwaia plikisa,
40023007	Witin nani pliki sa yabal ra upla nani ba mita witin nani ra tara kulki ai lakula daukbia; bara smasmalkra nani wibia.
40023008	"Sakuna man nani lika upla nani yarka smasmalkra mai wibia ra, kan man nani sut muihkam atia, bara Smasmalkra ba kumi baman brisma.
40023009	Man nani upla kumi ra sin naha tasba ra aisa wipara, kan man nani Aisa kumi baman brisma, witinka kasbrika purara sa.
40023010	Ta uplika nani sin mai maki bangbiara, kan Mesaia ba baman sika tam uplika ba. sa.
40023011	Ya ai walka nani dukya dauki ba, baha sika man nani tilamra kau tara ba.
40023012	Kan ya tara puli ba, mayara ikan kabia, sakuna ya mayara baui ba, tara daukan kabia.
40023013	"Lâ smasmalkra nani bara Parisi nani, kuninkira nani, man nani mampara saura pali kabia! Kan man nani Kasbrika purara ba Kingka aimaki laka durka ba prakisma, upla wala nani dimbia apia dukyara. Man nani pali sin dimras, upla wala nani diman dauki ba sin yabram dimras.
40023014	[Lâ smasmalkra nani bara Parisi nani, kuninkira nani, man nani mapara alai pali kabia, kan man nani mita pyarka nani watla mihta dakbisma, bara kunin baman pura sunra nani yari daukisma. Baha mita man nani ba kau pât tara brima.]
40023015	"Lâ smasmalkra nani bara Parisi nani, kuninkira nani, man nani mampara alai pali kabia! Man nani kabu nani bara kuntri nani sin aiska impakisma upla kum Ju lakara lakaia dukiara; bara lakram bara, baha uplika ba aima wal prais man nani purkam ra kau saura daukisma, help pauta ra waia dukiara.
40023016	"Ta uplika diara kaikras nani, man nani mampara saura pali kabia!, kan man nani naku wisma: 'Ya tempel nina maki swir taki pramis kum daukbia kaka, baha ba bahki sa; sakuna tempel lalahka pauni nina maki swir takbia kaka, ai bila aisin ba kat daukaia sa.'
40023017	Sinskas diara kaikras tara nani! Dia ba kau tara sa: lalah pauni ba apia kaka tempel ba, baha mita lalah pauni hulikira dauki ba?
40023018	Man nani naku sin wisma: 'Ya altar nina maki swir taki pramis kum daukbia kaka, baha lika bahki sa; sakuna altar purara prisant ba nina maki swir takbia kaka, dia aisin ba kat daukaia sa.'
40023019	Diara kaikras sinskas tara nani! Dia ba kau tara sa: prisant ba apia kaka altar ba, baha mita prisant ba hulikira dauki ba?
40023020	Kan ya altar nina maki swir taki ba, altar ba dukyara baman swir takras, sakuna purara dia, dia bara ba sut dukyara sin;
40023021	bara ya tempel nina maki swir takisa kaka, tempel ba dukyara baman swir takras, sakuna Gâd dukyara sin, witinka baha ra iwi ba.
40023022	Baku sin, ya kasbrika purara ba nina maki swir takisa kaka, Gâd king iwaika ba dukyara swir takisa bara Gâd pali dukyara sin, witinka baha ra iwi ba.
40023023	"Lâ smasmalkra nani bara Parisi nani, kuninkira nani, man nani mampara saura pali kabia diara 10 bani wina kumi Gâd ra yabaia ba, man nani baha mint wahya, anis bara kumin wina yabisma, sakuna lâ smalkanka tara nani ba lika bila walras, baha nani sika; umpira kaikaia lâka ba, kasak wapni kaia lâka ba. Baha sika man nani daukaia sma ba, bara wala ba sin swiras ban dauki kaia sma.
40023024	Man nani, ta uplika diara kaikras nani!, brabra lupia diaikam wina singbi sakisma, sakuna kyamil tara kum langkisma.
40023025	"Lâ smasmalkra nani bara Parisi nani, kuninkira nani, man nani mampara saura pali kabia!, kan man nani kapkam, plitkam ba nina purak baman klin daukisma, sakuna bilara lika impliki bara gridi taki sakram lalahka ba baman bangki sa.
40023026	Man Parisi diara kaikras: kap bara plit ba bila taui ba pas klin, dauks, bara baku lika pura taui ba sin klin kabia!
40023027	"Lâ smasmalkra nani bara Parisi nani, kuninkira nani, man nani mampara saura pali kabia!, kan man nani lika sin raiti pint pihni dingkan bara pura mapa baman pain ba baku sma, sakuna bila taui lika upla pruan dusa nani, bara diara taski ni bangwan sa.
40023028	Man nani sin baku sma; purak lika upla nani mawan ra pain baku sma, sakuna kupiam bilara lika, kunin bara watauan laka man bangki sa.
40023029	"Lâ smasmalkra nani bara Parisi nani, kuninkira nani, man nani mampara saura pali kabia! Man nani mita dahra aisasara raitika ba paskisma, bara upla pain kan nani raitika sin pain pali skahkisma,
40023030	bara baha ningkara wisma: 'Yawan na wan damika nani pyua ra iwi kan kaka, dahra aisasara nani ikaia dukyara witin nani ra help munaia apia kan.'
40023031	Baha mita, nana ra pain kaikisma man nani ba dahra aisasara ikan nani ra ikan nani kyamka sma.
40023032	Baku bamna, damikam nani ta krikan ba, man nani dauki tnata alks!
40023033	"Pyuta nani! Pyuta saura nani kyamka! Man nani nahki hel pauta pâtka ba wina swak takma ki?
40023034	Baha mita, yang man nani ra dahra aisasara nani, sinskira nani, bara smasmalkra nani sin mai blikamna. Sakuna man nani mita witin nani tila wina tila nani ba ikma, dus prihni ra sama, wala nani ra lika prias watla nani bilara prukma, bara taun kum wina taun walara nina bliki rau sauhkma.
40023035	Bara baku sika man nani puramra pât kauhwbia, upla yamni nani sut upla mita ikan nani talia ba, Ebel kasakkira ba wina Birikaia luhpia Sakaraia ba kat, witin ba man nani mita tempel altar wal lilapas kat ikram.
40023036	Kasak pali man nani ra mai wisna, naha pâtka sut na lika naha pyua uplika nani ra balbia.
40023037	"Jerusalem, Jerusalem, man sika dahra aisasara nani ba ikisma, bara Gâd bila twatwilkra mai bliki nani ra walpa ni sabisma ba! Aima ailal luhpiam nani asla dauki brin ai daukan, sin kalila ai luhpia nani ai tnawa munhtara asla dauki ba baku, sakuna man apia wiram!
40023038	Bamna kais man nani wamtla ba nahki bila man swin ba;
40023039	kan yang man nani ra mai wisni, kli ai kaikma apia, naha bila nani man nani aisama ba pyua kat: 'Yamni pali sa witinka Dawan nina maki aula ba!' "
40024001	Jisas tempel wina taki mahka auya kan pyua, ai disaipelka nani ai lamara bal, tempel paskanka nani ba kulki mariki kan.
40024002	Sakuna Jisas pana witin nani ra win: --Man nani naha sut kaikisma? Kasak pali mai wisna, walpa kum walpa wala purara sin swin kabia apia. Sut kat slingbi sauhkan kabia.
40024003	Ningkara witin nani Alibit ilka ra wan; bara Jisas baha ra iwi kan bara, ai disaipelka nani bal, pusbi win: --Naha na ahkia kabia sapa yang nani ra ai wis. Man balaia sma ba bara tasba tnata sainka ba sin ani kabia ki?
40024004	Bara Jisas bila witin nani ra: --Aman kais, upla kumi sin yarka kunin mai munbiara.
40024005	Kan upla ailal yang nini maki balbia, bara naku aisabia: 'Yang sika Misaia'; bara upla ailal ra kunin munan.
40024006	Man nani sin war nani dukyara, bara war trabilka nani dukyara sin aisi kabia walma, sakuna sirang iwpara, baha ba baku kaia sa bamna; kuna tnata ba lika kau sa.
40024007	Kan kuntri kumi mita wala mapara aiklabia, tasba kum mita wala mapara war aiklabia; plun tiwan sin bara tasba nikban nani sin plis ailal ra kabia.
40024008	Naha sut na lika pât wauhwaia taka ba sika.
40024009	"Bara upla nani mita mai alki rau mai sauhkaia mai mangkbia, bara mai ikbia, bara upla sut mita yang taiwan misbara mai kaikbia.
40024010	Baha pyua ra upla ailal ai kasak lukan laka ba tikbia, bara pana pana ai walkara misbara kaikan kabia, waihla mihta ra sin mangkbia.
40024011	Kuninkira ailal bubia, bara wibia witin nani ba Gâd dahra aisasara sa, bara upla ailal ra kunin munbia.
40024012	Saurka uya kabia bamna, upla nani pana, pana latwan laka bri ba aihkika sut swibia.
40024013	Sakuna ya tnata kat ban bapi bubia ba, swaki sakan kabia.
40024014	Bara naha king laka sturka yamni na tasba aiskara smalkan kabia, kuntri sut baha ba pain kaikbia dukyara; bara lika tnata ba aimakbia.
40024015	"Dahra aisasara Danyal ulban diara taski ban swin tiwi ba dukyara; man nani naha na plis hulikira ra balan sa kaikma bara --ya aisi kaiki ba, tanka pain bri kabia--,
40024016	Bara Judia wina upla nani ba il nani ra plapaia sa.
40024017	Ya baha yuara ai watla bahnara kaka, bal iwi baha bila wina diara sakbiara;
40024018	bara ya ai nasla ra ba, kli taui bal, ai kwalka pan wahbiara.
40024019	Baha yua nani ra mairin kwihra nani bara tuktan kau tyala dakaki nani ba mapara lika Alai pali kabia!
40024020	Man nani Gâd ra makas, kauhwla pyua ra wingka puhbaia yua ra plapaia apia dukyara;
40024021	kan baha pyua ra pât wauhwanka nani manis kabia, bara bahmuna patitara pyua wina apu kan, tasba paskan wina, naika pyua ra sin baku kabia apia.
40024022	Bara Gâd baha pyua prak daukras kaka, upla kumi sin swaki sakan kabia apia; sakuna witin bak sakan nani ba latwanka ra prak daukbia.
40024023	"Bara upla kum mita man nani ra naku mai wibia kaka: 'Kais, Misaia ba nara sa', 'Kais, Misaia ba bara sa', man nani kasak lukpara.
40024024	Kan misaia kuninkira nani dahra aisasara kuninkira balbia; witin nani sain tara nani bara diara aihka nani daukbia upla ra kunin munaia dukyara, bara sip kaka, Gâd mita bak sakan nani bara sin kunin munaia.
40024025	Kais, naha sut man nani ra kaina manis wina mai wiri sa.
40024026	Baha mita, naku mai wibia kaka: 'Kais, witin bukra twi byara ra sa', man nani baha ra waprama; mai wibia kaka: 'Kais, naura rûm bilara sa', man nani kasak lukpara.
40024027	Kan imyula kum kasbrika purara ba lalma wina muna kat lipi ba baku, kabia Upla Luhpika waitna ba balbia bara.
40024028	Wîna tara pruan anira kabia bara, yakal tara nani asla takbia.
40024029	"Baha pât wauhwan yua nani lubia wal baku, yu lapta ba tihmu takbia, kati ba ai ingnika yabia apia, slilma nani ba kasbrika purara ba wina kauhwbia, kasbrika ba purara karnika nani sin nikban kabia.
40024030	Bara mika Upla Luhpia Waitna sainka ba kasbrika purara latan kaikbia, bara naha tasba uplika nani sut inbia, bara Upla Luhpika Waitna kasbrika purara karnika tara bara prana wal aula ba kaikbia bara.
40024031	Bara ai insalka nani blikbia trumpit binka tara ni ai uplika bak sakan nani ba pasa mapa wahlwal ba wina asla daukaia, tasba ta kum wina ta wala kat.
40024032	"Kwah damni dusa maprika lilka na lan taki bangws: Tnawa nani ba kau kura bara wahya nani ba baiwi pyua, man nani kaiki sma mani pyua ba pât baila sa.
40024033	Baku sin, naha sut kaikma pyua ra, kaiki bas tnata ba pât baila, dur palira sa.
40024034	Kasak pali mai wisni, naha pyua uplika nani kau pruras bara, naha dukya nani sut na takbia.
40024035	Kasbrika tasba wal lui wabia, sakuna bili nani lika aimakan kabia.
40024036	"Sakuna yua ba bara awarka ba lika upla kumi sin kaikras, kasbrika purara insal nani ba bara Gâd Luhpia pali sin kaikras. Gâd Aisa baman baha kaikisa.
40024037	"Noa yua nani ra pât takan ba baku takbia, upla Luhpia waitna kli balbia bara.
40024038	Baha yua nani ra, lisamra tara ba kainara, upla nani ba plun baman pî kan, diara dî kan, marit taki kan, ai luhpia mairin nani marit saki kan, Noa ark ra diman yua ba kat;
40024039	bara witin nani ai dara walras kan, lisamra tara ba bal sut brih wan ba kat. Upla Luhpia Waitna balbia pyua sin baku kabia.
40024040	Baha pyua ra waitna wal inslara kabia; kum ba brih wan kabia, wala ba lika swin kabia.
40024041	Mairin wal walpa ra akbi kabia; kum ba brih wan kabia, bara wala ba lika swin kabia.
40024042	"Man nani aihwaki bas, Dawan dia awarka ra balbia ba kaikras sma bamna.
40024043	Sakuna naha na kupiam krauki bas: Utla kum dawanka ba aîmplikra dia awarka ra balaia ba kaiki kaka, witin yapras aihwaki kabia, bara swika ai watla ba kriki dimi ai dukya implikbia apia.
40024044	Baha mita, man nani sin ridi kaia sma; kan bila kaikras kaprika Upla Luhpia Waitna ba balbia.
40024045	"Bamna ya pali ba alba kasak sinskira ba? Baha lika ai dawanka mita ai watla suliarka nani purara mangkan ba, witin nani ra pyua kat plun dakakbia dukyara.
40024046	Lilia pali kabia ani albika ai dawanka balbia pyua ra baku ai warkka dauki kaka sakbia ba.
40024047	Kasak pali man nani ra mai wisni, dawanka ba mita dia, dia bri ba sut ai mihta ra mangkbia.
40024048	Sakuna baha albika ba saura kaka, bara ai kupia ra luki ai dawanka ba wihka takaskisa wisi,
40024049	alba wala nani ra mahka rau sauhkuya, bara laya saura dadira nani aikuki plun pibia bara diara dibia.
40024050	Bara ai dawanka bila kaikras pali yuara balbia, awarka sin kaikras kaka;
40024051	bara kau pât saura pali ba yabia, bamna kuninkira nani pâtka ba aikuki wauhbia. Bara mika witin inbia, ai napa nani sin arkbia.
40025001	"Baha yuara, Gâd king aimaki laka ba lika tyara 10 na wal baku kabia, witinka nani ai lampka laya nani brihwan, waitna marit takuya ba yula kahbaia dukyara.
40025002	Tila ba wina, 5 ba sinskas kan, bara 5 wala ba lika sinskira nani kata.
40025003	Sinskas nani ba ai lampka nani brih wan, sakuna lampka laya ba kli lamp ra laikan kan ba brih waras kan;
40025004	sakuna sinskira nani ba lika ai lampka nani bara ai batilka nani lampka laya kira brihwan.
40025005	Marit taki waitnika ba pât balras kan bamna, sut yapan daukan, bara sut mahka yapan.
40025006	Tihmia wal bakriki baku kan, bila baikra kum naku walata: 'Waitnika marit taki ba pât aula; taki bal, wal prawaia!'
40025007	Baha tyara nani ba sut mahka mita, ai lampka nani ridi daukan.
40025008	Sinskas nani ba mita sinskira nani bara win: 'Lampkam laya ba wina wira aikram, lampki nani na daswuya sa bamna.'
40025009	Sakuna tyara sinskira nani ba mita pana win: 'Apia, baku lika yang nani briaia bara man nani briaia sin lamp laya ra aitani kabia apia. Kau yamni sa atki pliskara wama kaka bara man nani dukyam atki brima.'
40025010	Sakuna tyara sinskas 5 ba lamp laya atkaia auya kan bara, waitnika ba balan. Tyara nani ridi kan ba witin wal marit patara wih diman, bara dur ba prakan.
40025011	Ba ningkara, tyara wala nani ba sin balan, bara naku winan: 'Dawan, dawan, yang nani durki saks!'
40025012	Sakuna witin mita pana win: 'Kasak pali, yang man nani ba mai kaikras!'
40025013	Bara kau pura praki Jisas witin nani ra win: --Man nani aihwaki bas, yang balaia yua, bara awarka ba sin kaikras sma bamna.
40025014	"Gâd king aimaki laka sin waitna kum baku, witinka ba kuntri walara mahka impakaia kan, bara ai albika nani paiwi, ai dukya nani ba witin nani mihta ra mangkan.
40025015	Kumira lalah ma 5,000 yaban, walara 2,000 bara walara 1,000 prais; kumi banira ai sinska prais ba kat yan, bara witin lika mahka impakan.
40025016	Alba lalah 5,000 brin ba, baha lalahka ba wal bisnis dauki kau lalah 5,000 sakan.
40025017	Baku sin, 2,000 brin ba, kau 2,000 pura sakan.
40025018	Sakuna 1,000 brin ba, wih tasba ra sahlki, ai dawanka lalahka ba yukukan.
40025019	"Pyua wihka luan bara, baha albika nani dawanka kata ba balan, bara witin nani wal mahka kulkan.
40025020	Lalah 5,000 brin ba pas balan, bara 5,000 wala win takan ba ai dawanka ra yabi, win: 'Dawan, man mita 5,000 aikram. Kais, nara sa 5,000 wala sakri ba.'
40025021	Dawanka ba bila: 'Pain; man ba alba pain bara yamni sma. Man ba diara wiria wal kasak kapram bamna, diara ailal mihtam ra mangkamna. Bal dimi, yang wal lilia bris.'
40025022	Baha wina, alba lalah 2,000 brin ba balan, bara naku win: 'Dawan, man mita 2,000 aikram. Kais, nara kau 2,000 pura sakri na.'
40025023	Ai dawanka ba mita win: 'Upla pain; man ba alba pain bara yamni sma. Diara wiria lupia wal kasak kapram bamna, yang mita kau diara ailal mihtam ra mangkamna. Bal dimi, yang wal lilia bris.'
40025024	"Sakuna alba 1,000 brin ba balan, ai dawanka ra naku win: 'Dawan, yang kaikri man ba waitna kupiam karna, bara mangkras sma ba wina man dakisma, diara yakabras sma ba wina sin wahbisma.
40025025	Baha mita, yang sîbri kapri, bamna wih lalahkam ba tasba ra yukukri. Sakuna dukyam nara na bris.'
40025026	Dawanka ba bila: 'Alba saura sringwaski ra, man pain kaiki kapram yang mangkras sna ba wina daukisna, bara diara yakabras sna ba wina wahbisna.
40025027	Baha mita, lalahki ba bankra sunaia kapram, yang kli taui balri bara duki ba pura praki briaia kapri.'
40025028	Bamna baha ra kan nani bara win: 'Lalah ma 1,000 ba witin mihta dakbi, 10,000 bri bara yas.
40025029	Kan ya bri bara, kau yaban kabia, bara witin pura lui bri kabia; sakuna ya apu ba wina lika, wiria lupia bri ba sut mihta dakban kabia.
40025030	Bara naha alba bahki saura na, lata tihmuka ra lulki swis; baha ra sika witin inbia, ai napa nani sin arkbia.'
40025031	"Witinka Upla Luhpika waitna ba Gâd insalka sut kira king baku balbia bara, ai king iwaika ingnikira ra iwbia.
40025032	Tasba aiska uplika nani ba ai mawan ra asla takbia, bara witin mita baha nani ba aihka, aihka dakbi sakbia, sepad mita syîp nani ba guts nani wina dakbi saki ba baku.
40025033	Syîp nani ba ai aihkika tanira lakbia, guts nani ba lika ai smihka tanira.
40025034	Bara King ba ai aihkikara nani bara wibia: 'Bal man nani, Aisiki mita yamni mai munan nani sma ba; king tasbaia na man nani dukyam wisi Gâd tasba paskan wina ridi dauki ban bri ba, bri bangs.
40025035	Kan plun ai dauki kan, man nani plun aikram; din ai dauki kan, man nani li aikram; trengsar baku tauki kapri, man nani wamtlara dingki ai briram.
40025036	Kwala apu kapri, man nani mita aikram; siknis kapri, man nani wih ai kaikram; silak ra kapri, man nani ai kaikaia watma.'
40025037	Bara upla kasak wapni nani ba makabi walbia: 'Dawan, ahkia plun mai dauki kan yang nani mai kaikri, bara plun piaia maikri? Apia kaka ahkia diran mai dauki kan mai kaiki. Yang nani li diaia maikri?
40025038	Ahkia yang nani mai kaikri upla trengsar baku tauki kapram bara, yang nani waitla ra mai briri apia kaka kwala apu kapram yang nani mita maikri?
40025039	Ahkia siknis kapram, silak ra kapram, bara yang nani wih mai kaikri?'
40025040	Bara King ba wibia: 'Kasak pali man nani ra mai wisni, dia, dia naha muihki bauikira nani ra diara kumi dukyara daukram ba, yang palira sika man nani ai daukram ba.'
40025041	"Bamna king ba mita ai smihkara nani bara wibia: 'Yang wina taki was, mai latuban nani sma ba; ban kaiara pauta lakni debil ai insalka nani wal dukya wisi ridi daukan bara man nani was.
40025042	Kan plun ai dauki kan, man nani plun ai dakakras, din ai dauki kan, li aikras;
40025043	trengsar baku tauki kapri, man nani wamtlara ai briras kapram. Kwala apu kapri, man nani aikras; siknis kapri, silak ra sin, bara man nani wih ai kaikras.'
40025044	Bara witin nani pana wibia: 'Dawan, ahkia yang nani plun mai dauki kan mai kaiki, apia kaka diran mai dauki kan, apia kaka trengsar baku, apia kaka kwala apu, apia kaka siknis, apia kaka silak ra, bara help mai munras kapri?'
40025045	Bara King ba mita pana wibia: 'Kasak pali man nani ra mai wisna, dia, dia naha uplika nani bauikira kumira daukras kapram kaka, yang dukyara sika man nani daukras.'
40025046	Bamna naha nani na ban kaiara pât wauhwanka ra wabia, sakuna kasakkira nani ba lika raya ban kaiara wabia."
40026001	Jisas naha diara nani na sut aisan ningkara, ai disaipelka nani ra win:
40026002	Man nani kaikisma baku, yu wal lubia ningkara, insal luan yua lilia kabia; bara Upla Luhpika waitna, waihli nani mihta ra ai mangkbia dus prihni ra ai sabaia.
40026003	Bara prîst wihta nani, lâ smasmalkra nani, Ju wihtka almuk nani kira, prîst nani wihta tara Keyapas watla latara asla takan.
40026004	Baha ra lâ daukan, Jisas ba kunin muni alki, ikaia.
40026005	Sakuna witin nani naku aisi kan: --Lilia yua tara ra lika apia, upla nani unsabia ra sia.
40026006	Jisas Betania ra kan, Saiman Leparka ra ba watla ra;
40026007	bara mairin kum alabaster batilka kum ra batana laya kia painkira mana pali kan ba bahngki brih, Jisas lamara balan. Witin tebil ra iwi kan bara, mairka na mita batanka laya bani lal purara laikan.
40026008	Disaipel nani naha kaikan bara, ai kupia baiki, naku aisan: --Dia muni naku bahki tikaia?
40026009	Naha na sip kan mana tara wauhwi atki, upla umpira nani ra help munaia.
40026010	Jisas naha wali, witin nani ra win: --Dia muni naha mairka ra munisma? Witin yang ra ai daukan na lika diara pain pali sa.
40026011	Upla umpira nani ba man nani aikuki ban bri kama, sakuna yang lika tilamra ban ai bri kama apia.
40026012	Naha mairka batana laya kia painkira wîni tara purara laikan na lika, tasba ra ai bikaia dukyara ridi ai daukan sa.
40026013	Kasak pali man nani ra mai wisni, ani anira naha swaki sakan sturka yamni na smalkan kabia bara, tasba aiskara, naha mairka daukan na sin aisin kabia, upla nani witinra ban luki kaia ba dukyara.
40026014	Bara disaipel 12 ba tila wina kumi, nina Judas Iskariat, prîst wihta nani aikuki aisaia wan,
40026015	bara witin nani ra win: -- Nahki aikma ki Jisas ba mihtam ra mangkamna kaka? Witin nani mita praiska marikan: lalah pihni 30 ma.
40026016	Bara baha yua wina, Judas ba sans pain kum pliki kan Jisas ba witin nani mihta ra mangkaia.
40026017	Lilia tara yua pas palira, brit lebin mangkras piaia yua ba, disaipel nani Jisas lamara balan bara makabi walan: --Insal luan tutnika pata ba anira want sma yang nani wih ridi daukamna?
40026018	Witin mita pana win: --Taun ra was, waitna kum watla ra, bara naku wis: 'Smasmalkra bila wisa: Awarki ba pât baila sa, bamna wamtlara disaipelki nani aikuki insal luan yua lilia ba daukaisna.'
40026019	Disaipel nani Jisas win ba baku daukan, bara insal luan tutnika pata ba ridi daukan.
40026020	Tihmia iwan bara, Jisas ai disaipelka nani aikuki tebil ra iwi kata;
40026021	witin nani kau plun pî kan bara Jisas witin nani ra win: --Kasak pali mai wisna, man nani tilam wina kum bui waihli mihta ra ai mangkbia.
40026022	Bara witin nani sari pali taki, kumi kumira witinra makabi walan: --Dawan, yang sna ki?
40026023	Bara Jisas pana win: --Ya yang wal sin plitka ra pi ba, baha sika waihli mihta ra ai mangkbia ba.
40026024	Upla Luhpia Waitna ba, Ulbankara nani ra dia ulban ba yabalka bak waia sa, sakuna waihla mihta ra mangki ba uplika ba mapara lika saura pali kabia! Kau aitani kaia kan baha uplika ba aisubi takras kan kaka.
40026025	Bara Judas, witinka ai waihla mihta ra mangki kan ba aisi, win: --Smasmalkra, baha ba yang sna ki? Jisas bila: --Au, man sika.
40026026	Pi kan bara, Jisas ai mihta ra brit ba brih, tingki wih, kriki muni, ai disaipelka nani ra yabi, win: --Pi bangs; naha sika yang wîni tara ba.
40026027	Baha ningkara, ai mihta ra kap ba brih, tingki wih, witin nani ra laki yabi, win: --Man nani sut naha na wina dî bangs,
40026028	kan naha sika yang tailia, naha mita sika lâ daukan ba karnika yabi ba, bara upla ailal saurka swih tikaia dukyara laiwan sa.
40026029	Sakuna mai wisna, naha wainka laya wina kli dimna apia, man nani aikuki Aisiki king aimaki tasbaia ra wain raya dimna yua ba kat.
40026030	Witin nani lawana nani aiwanan ningkara, Alibit ilka ra wan.
40026031	Bara Jisas witin nani ra win: --Man nani sut naha tihmia yang dukyara aihka lukma; kan ulbankara wisa: 'Sepad ba ikamna, bara syîpka nani ba aihka, aihka yakaban kabia.'
40026032	Sakuna yang pruan wina kli buamna bara, man nani kainamra Galilira wamna.
40026033	Bara Pita Jisas ra win: --Upla man dukyamra aihka lukbia kra, sakuna yang lika apia.
40026034	Bara Jisas witinra win: --Kasak pali mai wisna, naha sin tihmika kau kalila aiwanras bara, man aima yuhmpa ai kaikras wima.
40026035	Pita bila: --Man wal pruaia kamna kra, sakuna mai kaikras lika aisamna apia. Bara disaipel nani sut sin baku aisin.
40026036	Bara Jisas ai disaipelka nani aikuki plis kumira balan, nina Getsemani, bara witin nani ra win: --Nahara iwi bangs, yang naura puri sunaia auna bamna.
40026037	Bara Pita bara Sebedi luhpia wal ba kat brihwan, bara mahka sari tara daukan.
40026038	Bara witin nani ra win: --Solki ra sari pali ai daukisa, pruaia prais. Man nani nahara takas, bara yang wal aihwaki bas.
40026039	Bara Jisas kan mapara kau wiria wih, ai mawan ra tasba kat kauhwi, Gâd ra ai pura suni, win: "Aisiki, sip kaka, yarka yang naha pâtka wauhwamna ra; sakuna yang want sna ba baku lika apia, man kupiam laka kat lika."
40026040	Bara ai disaipelka nani bara kan ba pliskara taui balan bara, yapi kan sakan; bara Pita ra win: --Man nani yang wal awar kum pan sip aihwakras kapram ki?
40026041	Aihwaki puram suni bas, traika kaikanra kauhma ra sia. Kasak pali, spiritkam ba wilin sa, sakuna wînam ba lika swapni sa.
40026042	Kli aima wala wan, bara naku ai pura sunan: "Aisiki, naha pâtka wauhwaia sna na wina sip swaki ai sakras sma kaka, man kupiam laka kat takbia."
40026043	Tisku kan kli taui balan bara, disaipel nani ba kli yapi kan sakan, kan ai nakra nani ba ban prak prawi kan yapan pali dauki kan ba mita.
40026044	Baha nani ba swisi, naha kira aima yuhmpa ai pura sunaia wan, bara sin bila nani aisin.
40026045	Bara disaipel nani bara kan ba kat bal, win: --Nana ra lika, yapi bangs bara wingka puhbaia bris. Upla luhpia waitna, upla saurakira nani mihta ra ai mangkaia awarka ba aimakan sa.
40026046	Bus, kaisa mahka; waihli mihta ra ai mangki uplika ba pât wan lamara aula.
40026047	Kau Jisas aisi kan bara, Judas balan, witinka disaipel 12 ba wina kumi kan ba, bara witin wal upla ailal sord nani bara dus nani brih aula kan. Witin nani ba prîst tara nani bara Ju wihta almuk nani mita blikan kan.
40026048	Judas, witinka bui waihla mihta ra mangki kan ba, baha nani ra sain kum yabi, win kan: "Ani uplika ra yang kyawalamna ba, baha sika; man nani alks."
40026049	Bara witin Jisas lamara bal, win: --Naksa, Smasmalkra! Bara witinra kiawalan.
40026050	Jisas pana witinra win: --Uplika, dia daukaia mata aulma ba dauks. Bara baha nani Jisas lamara bal, alki priskan.
40026051	Baha kat, Jisas uplika nani wina kum ai sordka saki, prîst tara albika kum ra kyama klaki taih dakban.
40026052	Bara Jisas witinra win: --Sordkam ba kli watlika ra dingks. Kan ani uplika nani sordka ni aiklabi ba, sin sordka wal prubia.
40026053	Kaikras sma ki yang sip sna Aisiki ra makabaia, bara witin sip sa naha pali pyua insal dakni 12 pura blikaia?
40026054	Sakuna baku kaka, ulbankara baku takaia wi ba nahki aimakbia ki?
40026055	Bara Jisas uplika nani ra win: --Yang na aîmplikra kapri kan baku, man nani sord bara dus nani brih bal takram ki? Yu bani man nani tilamra tempel ra iwi smalki kapri, bara ai alki ai priskras katma.
40026056	Sakuna naha na naku takisa, dahra aisasara nani Ulbankara win ba aimakaia dukyara. Bara disaipel nani sut Jisas ba yakan swisi, plapan.
40026057	Jisas ra alkan nani ba mita Keyapas ra brih wan; witinka ba sika kau prîst wihta tara kan. Baha ra lâ smasmalkra nani bara wihta almuk nani sut asla takan kan.
40026058	Sakuna Pita lika lai wina nina bliki, ban wihta tara watla lata kat wan, bara baha ra dimi tempel main kakaira nani aikuki iwi kan, diara ba nahki takbia sapa kaikaia.
40026059	Prîst tara nani bara lâ wihta nani ba witnis pliki kan, kunin kabia sin ban, Jisas ba prura pâtka ra dingkaia dukyara.
40026060	Sakuna sip sakan kan, upla ailal bal witin mapara kunin aisin sakuna; bara las kat witnis kuninkira wal bal,
40026061	naku win: --Naha waitnika naku aisin: 'Yang sip sna Gâd tempelka ba sauhki tikaia, bara yu yuhmpa ra kli bapaia.'
40026062	Bara prîst nani wihtka ba tit bui, Jisas ra win: --Pana diara kumi sin aisaras sma ki? Diara mampara aisi bangwi na dia atia ki?
40026063	Sakuna Jisas sap kan. Bara prîst nani wihtka ba mita win: --Gâd rayakira ba nina ra, swir taki mamkabi walisna man ba kasak ba kat aisama. Wan wis man ba Misaia, Gâd Luhpia sma sapa.
40026064	Jisas pana witinra win: --Man baku aisaram. Bara yang sin man nani ra mai wisna, Upla Luhpia Waitna ba Gâd, Karnika sut bri ba mihta aihkikara iwi kasbrika purara wina aula kaikma.
40026065	Bara prîst nani wihtka ba ai kwalka nani bisbi kalki, win: --Naha waitnika Gâd mapara saura aisin! Dia dukyara yawan witnis nani kau aisaia kabia ki? Man nani pali ai bila saura nani ba walram;
40026066	bamna man nani nahki luki sma ki? Witin nani pana win: -- Witin ba pâtki ra sa, bara witin pruaia sa!
40026067	Ai mawan ra yabalaia tuhbi, prukan. Wala nani mita mawan ra pruki,
40026068	naku win: --Man Misaia sma ba, luki saks ya mita mai prukan sapa!
40026069	Bara ban kan, Pita kata utla latara iwi kan, bara alba mairin kum ai lamara bal, naku win: --Man sin Jisas Galili wina ba wal tauki kapram.
40026070	Pita bui apia pali win upla sut mawan ra, nan aisi: --Dia aisisma sapa yang tanka sin briras.
40026071	Pita pât dur lamara auya kan bara, alba mairin wala kum mita kaiki, baha ra kan bara win: --Naha waitnika sin Jisas Nasaret wina ba wal tauki kan.
40026072	Bara Pita kli swir taki pali apia win, naku aisi: --Baha waitnika yang kakaira apia!
40026073	Kau naika mapara, baha ra kan ba Pita lamara aidrubi bal, win: --Kasak pali, man sin baha nani tila wina kum sma, bilam aisisma bara latan sa bamna.
40026074	Baha wina mahka witin swir taki, win: --Yang baha waitnika ba kaikras! Bamna baha sin pali pyua kalila kum aiwanan.
40026075	Bara mika Jisas win ba ai kupia tang krauan: 'Kau kalila aiwanras kaka, aima yuhmpa yang ra ai kaikras wima.' Bara Pita baha wina taki, sari pali inan.
40027001	Titan baiwan ra, prîst wihta nani sut, Ju wihta almuk nani kira, ai laka daukan Jisas ra ikaia.
40027002	Bamna witin nani Jisas ba prîstki Pailet ra brih wan witin Rom wihta tara ba.
40027003	Bara Judas, witinka mita waihla mihta ra mangkan kan ba, waihla nani Jisas pâtra dingkan kan kaiki, ai kupia ra sari lukan, bara lalah pihni ma 30 ba prîst wihta nani ra bara wihta almuk nani ra kli brisi yaban,
40027004	nan win: --Yang saura daukri, waitna pâtkas kum prura pâtka ra mangkri bamna. Sakuna witin nani bila: --Bara baha ba yang nani maipara dia saki? Ba lika man kaikma si!
40027005	Bara Judas lalahka ba tempel ra lulki si, mahka taki wih, ai langki pruan.
40027006	Prîst wihta nani lalahka ba wahbi, naku win: --Lâ apia sa naha lalahka prisant mangkaika watla ra mangkaia, tala mana sa bamna.
40027007	Bara aikuki lâ daukan baha lalahka ni tasba kum atkaia, nina ba Sumi Dadaukra tasbaia, baha ra upla trengsar nani bikaia dukyara.
40027008	Baha mita, baha tasbaia naiwa yua kat, tala tasbaia makisa.
40027009	Bara baku, dahra aisasara Jirimaia aisin kan ba aimakan: "Lalah pihni ma 30 ba bri bangwan, baha ni Israel uplika nani mita ai praiska mangkan kan ba,
40027010	bara baha ni sumi dadaukra tasbaia ba atkan, Dawan mita adar aikan ba baku."
40027011	Jisas ba wihta tara mawan ra brihwan kata, bara baha mita witin ra makabi walan: --Man ba Ju nani kingka sma ki? Jisas bila: --Baku sa, man aisaram ba kat.
40027012	Bara prîst wihta nani bara wihta almuk nani mita ai dahra saki kan bara, Jisas pana diara kumi sin aisaras kan.
40027013	Baha mita Pailat ba makabi walan: --Diara mampara aisan ba walras sma ki?
40027014	Sakuna Jisas pana witinra diara wiras; bara wihta tara ba ta iwan, bamna dia lukaia sapa sin kaikras kan.
40027015	Lilia tara yuara, wihta tara ba ai laka kum brikan, baha ba lika: silak uplika kum upla nani ra pri saki yaia, ani witin nani want wibia ba.
40027016	Baha pyua ra, silak uplika tara pali kum kan, nina ba Jisas Barabas;
40027017	bara witin nani asla prawan kan bara, Pailet baha nani ra makabi walan: --Man nani ya ba want sma pri saki maikamna: Jisas Barabas apia kaka Jisas, witinka nina Kraist maki ba?
40027018	Kan Pailet kaikan Jisas ra tuman brih bangwi kan ba mita sika ai mihta ra mangkan ba.
40027019	Pailet lâ daukaika pliskara iwi kan bara, ai maîa ai bila bliki, nan win: "Baha waitnika kasakkira ba tilara dimpara, witin pâtka mita na tihmia yang yaprisauhkan saura pali kum kaikri baman."
40027020	Sakuna prîst wihta nani bara wihta almuk nani kira, upla nani kupia ba alki, Barabas ba pri sakbia wisi makabaia win, sakuna Jisas ba lika ikbia.
40027021	Pailet witin nani ra kli aisi, makabi walan: --Wal na wina ani ba want sma pri saki maikamna? Bara witin nani bila: --Barabas ba!
40027022	Pailet witin nani ra makabi walan: --Bara Jisas, nina Kraist maki ba wal dia daukamna ki? Sut bila: --Dus prihni ra sas!
40027023	Bara Pailet bila: --Bamna, witin na dia saurka daukan saki? Sakuna witin nani kli ai pura winan: --Dus prihni ra sas!
40027024	Pailet witin sip diara daukras kan kaikan, bara bin lika kau tara taki kan bara, adar yan li brisal yabia, bara upla sut mawan ra ai mihta nani sikbi, win: --Naha waitnika pruaia pâtka na man nani dauki sma; yang baha tilara apu.
40027025	Bara upla sut mita pana win: --Yang nani, bara luhpi nani sin witin pruanka ba dukyara pâtki ra taki bangwisna!
40027026	Bara Pailet mita Barabas ba pri sakan; ningkara, Jisas ba yan wipan, bara baha nani mihta ra mangkan dus prihni ra sabaia.
40027027	Ba wina Pailet suldawaka nani mita Jisas ba wihta tara watla latara brihwan, bara suldawa daknika aiska ba ai tnaya kir asla takan.
40027028	Bamna ai kwalka ba daiki, kwala pauni kum dingkan,
40027029	bara kyaya kraunka kum pitbi ai lal ra mangkan, ai mihta aihkikara sin yauhrus dusa kum. Bara ai mawan ra ai lula krikan, ai lawaska kiki, witinra wi kan: --Raya kabia, Ju nani Kingka ba!
40027030	Yabalaia sin tuhbi kan, bara yauhrus dusa ba brih lal ra pruki kan.
40027031	Baku ai lawaska kiki si, kwalka pauni ba daiki, bara ai kwalka ba kli dingkan. Bara witin nani brih wan dus prihni ra sabaia.
40027032	Witin nani taki auya kan bara, Sairini wina waitnika kum wal prawan, nina ba Saiman; bara witinra taibi munan Jisas dusa prihni ba twilkaia.
40027033	Baku witin nani tasba kum ra balan, nina Golgata, baha tanka ba lika: "Wan lalkahmka tasbaia".
40027034	Baha ra witin nani mita Jisas ra wain sîka maka tahpla wal yan diaia; sakuna Jisas ai bilara wiria dî muni, kau din daukras kan.
40027035	Pât dus prihni ra saban ningkara, suldawa nani ba dais pulan Jisas kwalka ba yui dauki briaia dukyara.
40027036	Ba ningkara, baha ra iwan aihwakaia dukiara.
40027037	Ai pâtka tanka ba dukyara, lal purara bila nani ulbi mangkan. Ulbanka ba naku kata: "Naha sika Jisas, Ju nani Kingka ba."
40027038	Aîmplikra wal sin witin wal dus ra saban kan, kum ba ai aihkikara, wala ba ai smihkara.
40027039	Bahak lui kan nani ba mita swira dauki, ailal wauhwi kan,
40027040	naku aisan kan: --Man, tempel ba slingbi yu yuhmpa ra kli paskisma ba, man wînam kat swaki taks! Gâd luhpia sma kaka, dus prihni ba wina bal iws!
40027041	Baku sin prîst wihta nani, lâ smasmalkra nani, Parisi nani, wihta almuk nani kira ai lawaska kiki kan, bara pana, pana nan aisi kan:
40027042	Witin upla wala nani ra swaki sakan, sakuna ai wîna lika sip swaki sakras. Witin ba Israel Kingka sa kaka, dus prihni ba wina bal iwbia, bara yawan sut witinra kasak lukbia!
40027043	Witin Gâd ra kasak lukan: bamna Gâd mita witinra swaki sakbia nana ra, witin baku want sa kaka; kan witin wan win, witin ba Gâd Luhpia sa.
40027044	Aîmplikra nani witin wal dus ra saban kan ba mita sin ai swira dauki kan.
40027045	Bara tasba aiska ba tihmu tara takan, yu wan lal kat wina tutni 3 aklak kat.
40027046	Bara baha sin awarka lamara, Jisas aitabaiki winan: "Eli, Eli, lama sabaktani?" (Baha tanka lika: "Yang Gâdki, yang Gâdki, diakan lulki ai swiram ki?")
40027047	Tila nani baha ra kan nani ba baha wali, nan aisan: --Waitnika na dahra aisasara Ilaidya ra winisa.
40027048	Sin pyua ra, baha nani wina kum plapi wih kut kum brih balan, bara wain saura wal buski, dus kum ra mangki, ai lamara brihwan dibia wisi.
40027049	Sakuna wala nani ba bila: --Swis; kaikpi Ilaidya ba bal swaki sakbia sapa.
40027050	Jisas kli ai bila baikra tara wini si, pruan.
40027051	Baha sin pyua ra, tempel kwalka paman kan ba lilak kalwan, pura wina munhta kat. Bara tasba ba nikban, walpa nani ba tar baiwan,
40027052	raiti nani ba kwawan, bara Gâd ra kasak luki uplika ailal pruan kan ba kli bukan kan.
40027053	Jisas kli pruan wina buan bara, naha nani raiti wina taki, Jerusalem taunka ra diman, bara upla ailal witin nani ba kaikan.
40027054	Bara suldawa kaptenka bara wala nani Jisas ra aihwaki kan ba kira, tasba nikban bara diara wala nani takan ba kaiki, sibrin tara daukan, bara nan win: --Kasak pali naha waitnika na Gâd Luhpia kan!
40027055	Mairin ailal baha ra kan, bara baha nani lai wina kaikan kan; naha nani na Galili wina Jisas nina blikan kan, bara witinra help sin muni kan.
40027056	Baha nani tilara kan Meri Magdalin, Meri witinka Jems bara Josep yaptika ba, bara Sebedi luhpia nani yaptika ba sin.
40027057	Pât tihmia iwuya kan bara, waitna lalahkira kum balan, nina ba Josep; witinka ba Arimatia taunka wina kan, bara witin sin Jisas disaipelka takan kan.
40027058	Bara witin Pailet ra wih, Jisas wîna tara ba makaban. Bamna Pailet adar yan witinra yabia.
40027059	Josep Jisas wîna tara ba brih, kwalyapa klin kum ra blaki,
40027060	witin raiti raya kum brikan bara brisi tnikan; baha raitika ba lika walpa kan sukutban. Raitika dimaiara walpa tara kum ni praki si, witin mahka wan.
40027061	Bara Meri Magdalin bara Meri wala ba kira baha raitika mawan ba kat iwi kan.
40027062	Yu wala, wiaia kaka, wingka puhbaia yua dukyara ridi daukaia ba ningkara, prîst wihta nani bara Parisi nani kira Pailet ra wan,
40027063	bara witinra naku win: --Wihtki, yang nani kupi krauisna baha kuninkirka ba kau raya kan pyua witin aisin, yu yuhmpa ningkara pruan wina kli bubia.
40027064	Baha mita adar yas raitika ba pain aihwaki bri kabia yu yuhmpa ba kat, bara baku mika ai disaipelka nani ba sip bal witin wîna tara ba impliki, upla nani ra ban kra nan wibia ra: "Witin pruan wina kli buan sa." Baku takbia kaka lika, taura kuninka aisin ba naha kuninka wal, naha las na kau saura kabia.
40027065	Pailet witin nani ra win: --Baha ra man nani suldawa nani brisma aihwakaia dukyara. Bamna man nani was, bara raiti ba kau pain sip kama ba kat dauks.
40027066	Bara witin nani wan, bara raitika ba kasak pali dauki, walpa raiti durka praki swin bara sîl kum prakan, bara aihwakaia suldawaka nani ba swisi, witin nani mahka wan.
40028001	Wingka puhbaia yua luan bara, wîk yua pas ba ingwi takan bara, Meri Magdalin bara Meri wala ba wal raiti ba kaikaia wan.
40028002	Tisku baku kan, tasba nikbanka tara kum takan. Baha ba Dawan insalka kum kasbrika purara ba wina bal iwan, bara raitika ra wih, raiti pura prakan kan walpaia ba karbi saki, baha purara iwan.
40028003	Witin ba ingni kan sin imyula baku, bara ai kwalka ba pihni ais klaswan baku kan.
40028004	Suldawa nani witinra kaikan pyua, sirang iwi tatatwi pruan baku kauhwi bangwan.
40028005	Bara insal ba mita mairka nani ra win: --Man nani sîbripara. Yang kaiki sna man nani ba Jisas dus prihni ra pruan ba plikisma.
40028006	Nara apu sa, witin aisin ba baku pruan wina buan sa. Bamna bal kais witin tnikan pliska ba.
40028007	Man nani aihni pali was, bara ai disaipelka nani ra maisapahks: 'Jisas ba pruan wina buan sa. Witin naha pali pyua Galili mata impakisa, bamna baha ra witinra kaikma.' Naha sika man nani ra aisaia bri kapri na.
40028008	Bara mairka nani aihni pali raiti ba wina wan, sîbrinkira bara lilia pali sin; bara plapan man wih ai disaipelka nani ra sturka ba maisapahkan.
40028009	Tisku baku kan, Jisas witin nani ra latan taki, lakula win. Bara witin nani Jisas lamara wih, ai mina nani ra kyaubi alki, ai lula kriki mayunan.
40028010	Jisas mita mairka nani ra win: --Man nani sîbripara. Muihki nani ra wih maisapahks Galilira wabia, bara baha ra ai kaikbia.
40028011	Mairin nani ba auya kan bara, suldawa kum, kum aihwaki kan ba tila wina, taun ra wih, prîst wihtka nani ra dia, dia takan ba sut maisapahkan.
40028012	Naha wihtka nani, wihta almuk nani aikuki ai laka daukan; bara suldawaka nani ra lalah ailal yaban muni.
40028013	Bara witin nani ra win: --Man nani naku aisas: "Yang nani tihmia yapi kapri, Jisas disaipelka nani bal ai wîna tara ba implikan."
40028014	Bara wihta tara kyama ra naha dimbia kaka, yang nani aisi kupia alkamna, bamna man nani pât brima lika lukpara.
40028015	Bara suldawaka nani lalahka ba brin, bara dia win ba kat wih daukan. Bara naiwa yua kat ban Ju nani baku tanka ba aisisa.
40028016	Baku bamna, disaipel 11 ba Galilira wan, Jisas mita win ilka ba kat.
40028017	Witin nani Jisas ra kaikan bara, ai lula kriki mayunan; sakuna kum, kum lika kau kasak lukras kan.
40028018	Bara Jisas witin nani lamara bal, naku win: --Karnika sut yang ra aikan sa, kasbrika purara bara tasba ra.
40028019	Bamna man nani nisan sut uplika nani ra was, bara yang disaipelki nani dauki bangs; tahbi dauki bangs, Aisa ba nina ra, Luhpia ba nina ra, bara Spirit Hulikira ba nina ra sin.
40028020	Bara smalki bangs dia, dia man nani ra adar maikri ba bila wali kaia. Bamna kaiki bas yang na man nani aikuki yu bani kamna, tasba tnata kat.
41001001	Naku sika, Gâd Luhpia Jisas Kraist sturka yamni ta krikan ba.
41001002	Dahra aisasara Aiseya naku ulban kan: "Yang bili twatwilkra ba, man kainamra blikisna, yabalkam ba ridi daukaia dukiara.
41001003	Upla iwras tasbaia ra, upla kum bila baikra karna winisa: 'Dawan yabalka ba ridi dauks, Yabal wapni kum kwaks.' "
41001004	Diara nani takan ba sika, Jan ba balan upla nani ra tahbi dauki kan upla iwras tasbaia ra. Witin nani ra sin ban naku aisi kan: "Man nani kupiam laks, bara tahbi mai sakbia, baku mika Gâd mita watauanka nani ban swih tikbia."
41001005	Judia bara Jerusalem taunka nani sut, witin ra walaia balan kan, bara ai saurka nani dahra sakan, Jan mita tahbi dauki kan Jordan awala ra.
41001006	Jan praka ba kyamil tawa ni daukan kan, ai maisawila ba bip taya ni paskan kan; bara ai pata ba lika tristrisya nani, nasma laya kan.
41001007	Upla nani ra smalki bara naku aisi kan: "Yang nini ra wala kum aula ba, witin lika yang purki ra kau karnika brisa, yang baui ai suska awa ba pan langkaia aitani apia sna.
41001008	Yang man nani ra li ni baman tahbi mai daukisni, sakuna witin lika, Spirit Hulikira ni tahbi mai daukbia."
41001009	Baha yua nani ra, Nasaret taunka wina Jisas taki wan, baha ba Galili kuntrika ra sa. Bara Jan mita Jordan awala ra tahbi sakan.
41001010	Bara kais, li wina taki aula kan bara, Jisas kaikan kasbrika pura ba kwawan, bara Spirit Hulikira ba, butku baku ai purara bal iwan.
41001011	Bila baikra kum sin kasbrika pura ba wina naku wisata: "Man ba yang Luhpi laitwankira sma; man ba bak saki mai briri."
41001012	Baha ningkara, Spirit mita Jisas ba upla iwras tasbaia ra brihwan.
41001013	Bahara Jisas 40 dis takaskan, daîwan kraskira nani tilara, bahara Setan mita ai traika kaikan; bara insal nani bal ai dukia dauki kan.
41001014	Witin nani Jan tatahbra silak watla ra mangkan ba ningkara, Jisas Galili ra wan, Gâd wina sturi yamni win ba aisi smalkaia.
41001015	Jisas naku aisi kan: "Pat pyua ba aimakan sa, bara Gâd king aimaki ba laka sin pat baila sa. Gâd ra kupiam laks, bara sturi yamni ba bris kasak lukan laka wal."
41001016	Jisas Galili lagunka unku wapi auya kan, kaikan Saiman ai muihni Andru wal bara kan. Naha nani lika inska aiâlkra kan, bara mahka ai tanka liura lulki kan.
41001017	Jisas mita win: --Man nani nini bliks, bara yang upla aiâlkra mai daukamna.
41001018	Baha sin pyua ra ai tanka nani swin bara, witin nani Jisas wal wan.
41001019	Jisas kau wira ai kan ra wan, bara Jems ai muihnika Jan wal bara kaikan, Sebedi luhpia nani ba, duri tara kum bilara, tan nani kalwan ba witin nani mani kan.
41001020	Baha ningkara winan, bara witin nani ai aisika Sebedi ba wark tatakra nani aikuki duri ba kat swin, bara mahka Jisas wal wan.
41001021	Bara witin nani Kapernaum ra diman. Wingka puhbaia yua ra, Jisas prias watla dimi, upla ra mahka smalkan.
41001022	Witin aisi kan ba dukyara upla nani ta iwan, kan smalkaia karnika bri uplika baku smalki kan, lâ smasmalkra nani baku lika apia.
41001023	Sinagog ra waitna kum kan. Witin lika spirit saura bri kan, bara ai bila baikra tara ni winan:
41001024	--Jisas Nasaret wina, dia muni yang nani tilira dimisma? Yang nani ra rau ai sauhkaia balram ki? Yang man ra pain mai kaikisna. Man lika Gâd Hulikira pali sma.
41001025	Jisas spirit saura bara laui dauki, naku win: --Bilam prak praks, bara waitnika na wina mahka taki was!
41001026	Spirit saura ba mita, waitnika ra yan lasa prukan, bara karna pali ai bila baikra wini, witin wina taki wan.
41001027	Upla sut ta iwi, pana, pana witin nani naku makabi wali kan: --Naha na dia ki? Smalkanka raya na dia pali sa ki? Waitnika na, spirit saura nani kangbi sakaia karnika brisa, bara ai bila sin walisa!
41001028	Bara isti pali Galili tasbaia aiska ra Jisas sturka walan.
41001029	Jisas, Jems, Jan wal Sinagog wina taki, Saiman bara Andru watla ra wan.
41001030	Saiman maîa yaptika rih dauki kan, bara witin nani Jisas ra win, witin siknis sa.
41001031	Jisas ai lamara wih, mihta ra alki bukan, bara rihka ba maka swin, bamna mairka ba mahka, witin nani dukia daukan.
41001032	Lapta diman, bara pat tihmia kan, upla sikniskira nani, spirit saura bri nani sut, Jisas ra brih balan.
41001033	Taun uplika sut dur lamara asla takan.
41001034	Jisas mita siknis sat, sat bri nani ba sut rakan, spirit saura nani sin ailal kangbi sakan. Jisas mita baha spiritka saura nani yan sturi sip aisaras, kan baha nani kaikan, witin ba ya kata.
41001035	Titan, yu baiwras, kau tihmia kan, Jisas mahka buan bara taun wina taki yakan ai pura sunaia wan plis kum yakan bara kan bara.
41001036	Saiman, ai uplika nani wala ba wal Jisas ra plikaia wan,
41001037	bara wal prawi muni, naku win: --Sut mai plikisa.
41001038	Sakuna witin bila: --Kaisa taun wala wan lamara nani bara, sturi yamni ba bahara sin smalkaia, kan yang baha dukyara balri.
41001039	Baku Jisas Galili kuntrika aiskara tauki kan, taun bani Sinagog ka ra smalki, bara spirit saura nani sin kangbi saki kan.
41001040	Lepar sikniska bri waitnika kum Jisas ra bal, ai lula kriki, naku aisin: --Man wilin sma kaka, sip sma sikniski na wina ai rakaia.
41001041	Bara Jisas kupia swapni takan, ai mihta ni kangbi, naku win: --Yang wilin sna, bamna mai rakisna!
41001042	Naha aisan wal baku, lepar sikniska ba rawan, bara klin takan.
41001043	Waitnika ba mahka blikan wan, sakuna kasak karna pali, naku win:
41001044	--Kais, upla kumi ra sin wipara. Prîst ra baman was, bara prisantkam sin yas, klin takaia dukyara, Moses win ba baku. Bara upla nani kaikbia man pat rawram ba.
41001045	Sakuna waitna ba wan, upla sut ra win, diara takan ba. Baha mita Jisas sip taun ra param takras kan, bara taun wina laiura baman tauki kan, upla apu tasbaia ra. Sakuna upla tasba ailal wina bal kaiki kan.
41002001	Yu kum luan ningkara, Jisas kli Kapernaum taunka ra diman; upla nani sin walan witin utla ra sa.
41002002	Tisku kan, pat upla ailal asla takan, dur lama ba sin tutukwa pali kan. Jisas mita Gâd sturka yamni ba aisi smalkan.
41002003	Bara waitna wahlwal mita, waitna kum twilki brih balan, witin wakia lawan sikniska bri kan bamna.
41002004	Upla ailal kan bamna, sip Jisas lamara waras, bara utla bahna ba pis kum saki, baha krikanka bak sikniskira ba krikri lupia kum ra mangki alahban.
41002005	Jisas mita upla nani kasak pali lukanka ba kaiki, sikniskira bara win: --Luhpi, man saurkam nani ba sut swih tikan sa.
41002006	Sakuna lâ smasmalkra nani bahara iwi kan ba, naku lukan:
41002007	"Waitnika na diakan baku aisisa ki? Witin Gâd mapara aisisa, kan Gâd baman upla saurka nani swih tikaia sip sa."
41002008	Sakuna Jisas pat kaikan baha nani ai kupia ra luki kan ba, bara makabi walan: --Man nani diakan baku lukisma ki?
41002009	Dia ba kau swapni sa, wakia lawan ra wiaia: 'Saurkam nani ba ban swin tikan sa', apia kaka witin ra wiaia: 'Bus, krikrikam ba brih bara waps'?
41002010	Yang man nani ra param mamrikamna Upla Luhpika waitna ba tasba ra karnika brisa, saurka nani ba ban swih tikaia. Bara wakia lawan waitnika ra win:
41002011	--Yang man ra mai wisni, bus, krikrikam ba brih, wamtla ra mahka was.
41002012	Baha siknis kata ba mahka buan, ai krikrika ba brih, baha wina mahka taki wan upla sut mawanku. Naha mita upla sut ta iwi, Gâd ra mayunan, naku wisi: --Yang nani kau naku pali diara kum kaikras.
41002013	Jisas kli lakun un ra wan. Upla sut ai lamara balan bara, witin aisi smalkan.
41002014	Jisas lui auya kan bara, Libai Alpius luhpia waitna ba kaikan, Rom ra blikaia lal mana saki ba watla ra iwi kan, bara Jisas mita win: --Nini bliks. Bara Libai mita, mahka ai nina blikan.
41002015	Jisas Libai watla ra plun pî kan, lal mana saki uplika nani, upla saurakira nani sin ai tebilka ra pî kan, Jisas ai disaipelka nani wal lamara, manas ai nina bliki kan bamna.
41002016	Sakuna lâ smasmalkra nani, Parisi nani sin kaikan Jisas baha nani wal plun pî kan, bara disaipel nani ra makabi walan: --Nahki kan lal mana saki nani, upla saurakira nani wal sin iwi plun pî sa?
41002017	Jisas naha wali, witin nani ra win: --Upla wîna dutki nani ba lika, daktar briaia apia sa, sikniskira nani ba lika. Yang upla kasakkira nani paiwaia balras, upla saurakira nani ra lika.
41002018	Aima kum, Jan disaipelka nani, Parisi nina blablikra nani sin plun wauhwi kan, upla tila nani bal Jisas ra makabi walan: --Diakan Jan disaipelka nani bara Parisi nina blablikra nani plun wauhwi sa, sakuna man disaipelkam nani lika baku daukras?
41002019	Jisas pana win: --Marit pata ra upla nani ba, marit takan waitnika ba witin nani wal sa kaka, aitani kabia ki baha nani plun wauhwaia? Marit takan waitnika ba kau ai tilara sa kaka, witin nani sip plun wauhwbia apia.
41002020	Sakuna pyu kum balbia bara, marit waitna ba witin nani wina sakan kabia. Ba kat lika witin nani plun wauhwbia.
41002021	"Upla kumi sin prak raya ra kwala almuk praki sipras, kan raya ba mita almuk ba aubi kalkisa, bara kalwanka kata ba kau tara takisa.
41002022	Upla kumi sin wain raya ba daiwan taya batilka almukka laikras, kan wain raya ba mita daîwra taya batilka ba sauhkisa, bara wain kata ba daîwra taya wal sut tiwisa. Baha mita wain raya ba daiwan taya raya ra laikaia sa.
41002023	Wingka puhbaia yua kum ra, Jisas insla mangkan tilak wapi kan, ai disaipelka nani plauar ma wahbi auya kan,
41002024	bara Parisi nani Jisas ra makabi walan: --Kaiks, dia muni disaipelkam nani wingka puhbaia yua ra wark daukaia apia ba, daukisa ki?
41002025	Sakuna Jisas bila: --Man nani kau Debit sturka ba aisi kaikras ki, witin ai sulyarka nani wal plun apu kan, plun pali sin dauki kan ba?
41002026	Debit Gâd watla ra diman, Abyatar prîst nani wihtka kan ba pyua ra, bara brit hulikira nani pin. Naha britka nani prîst nani wihtka baman piaia sip kan, sakuna Debit pih ai uplika nani ra sin yaban pin.
41002027	Jisas naku sin win: --Wingka puhbaia yua ba, upla dukyara daukan sa, sakuna upla ba wingka puhbaia yua dukyara lika apia.
41002028	Baha mita, Upla Luhpika waitna ba, wingka puhbaia yua purara sin karnika brisa.
41003001	Jisas kli Sinagog kum ra diman. Bahara mihta lawan waitnika kum kan.
