44006002	Bara apastil nani 12 ba mita kristian nani ba sut paiwi, naku win: --Pain apia sa yang nani na Gâd sturka yamni smalkaia laka ba swisi, plun yuaia laka ba ni kau daukaia.
44006003	Bahamna, man nani tilam wina waitna pain 7 pliki saks, sins laka aitani bri nani ba, bara Spirit Hulikira ni sin aibangwan kaka; baha nani ra naha warkka na yas daukbia.
44006004	Yang nani lika takaskras ban puri suniki ra, Dawan bila ba upla ra smalki kamna.
44006005	Naha diara na dukyara upla nani sut aitani lukan, bara witin nani mita Stiben ba ai tila wina pliki sakan. Witin lika waitna kumi kasak lukan laka ni, Spirit Hulikira ni sin bangwan kan. Bara Pilip, Prokurus, Naikenor, Taimon, Parmenas, bara Nikolas Antiok wina, witinka kan pyua ra Ju laka kakulkra kan ba.
44006006	Baha nani ba apastil nani mawanra bri balan, bara apastil nani mita ai pura sunan, ai mihta nani sin baha nani purara kahban.
44006007	Dawan bila ba kau pawi kan, bara kristian nani sin kau ailal taki kan Jerusalem ra. Ban Ju prîstka nani wina sin manas kasak lukan laka ba alkan.
44006008	Stiben lika waitna kumi Gâd karnika bara yamnika ni bangwan kan. Witin lika diara aihka nani, sain nani sin dauki kata upla nani tilara.
44006009	Prias watla uplika nani tila, nina alba kan pri takan nani maki ba, Sairini wina nani ba sin, Aleksandria wina bara Sailisia tasbaia wina bara Esia kuntrika wina nani ba sin, witin nani mahka Stiben wal blahwi kan.
44006010	Sakuna Stiben, Spirit Hulikira wina sins laka yan aisi kan ba mapara, witin nani lika sip buras kan.
44006011	Bamna witin nani upla tila nani ra lalah aibapi, naku aisabia win: "Yang nani walri, naha waitna na lika Moses mapara bara Gâd mapara sin saura aisi kan."
44006012	Naku ni almuk nani bara lâ smasmalkra nani ba sut sinska aihka laki bangwan, bamna witin nani mita Stiben ba alki lâ wihtka tara nani mawanra brihwan.
44006013	Witin nani lika witnis kuninkira nani bri balan, bara witin nani mita Stiben mapara mahka naku kunin aisin: --Naha waitnika lika tempel na mapara, bara lâ ba mapara sin saura aisin.
44006014	Yang nani sin walri witin aisi kan, baha Jisas Nasaret wina ba mita naha tempelka na sauhkbia, bara Moses lâ nani wankan ba sin aihka lakbia.
44006015	Bara lâ wihtka tara nani bara upla sut bara iwi kan ba mita Stiben ra taui kaikan bara, witin mawan ba sin insal mawan baku kan.
44007001	Bamna prîst tara mita Stiben ra makabi walan: --Naha diara nani sut na kasak saki?
44007002	Bara witin pasa aisin: --Muihni bara aisa nani ai wals. Wan Gâdka pranakira ba mita wan damika Ebraham ra param takan, witin Misuputimia ra iwi kan pyua, kau Eran ra wih iwras kan bara.
44007003	Witin ra nan win: 'Man tasbaiam bara tamya nani sut swis, bara was yang tasba kumi mamrikamna ya ba kat.'
44007004	Bara Ebraham Kaldi tasbaia swisi, Haran ra wih iwan. Bahara witin ai aisika ba pruan, ningkara Gâd mita Ebraham naha tasbaia ra brih balan, naiwa man nani nara iwi bangwisma ba.
44007005	Sakuna Gâd mita naha tasbaia ra witin ai dukya pali lika kau yaras kan, ai mina kahbaia pliska kum sin apia. Ban sakuna Gâd pramis munan tasbaia na witin ra yaia, bara prubia ningkara ai kyamka nani dukya kabia. Baha pyua ra Ebraham luhpa nani kau apu pali kan.
44007006	Baha purkara Gâd win: 'Man kyamkam nani ba, tasba trengsar kum ra iwbia. Bara alba pali kabia, rau sin munan kabia mani 400.'
44007007	Ban sakuna, Gâd naha sin win: 'Baha nisanka alba bribia ba yang mita lâka daukamna; ningka ra witin nani baha wina takbia, bara naha pliska ra bal yang duki daukbia.'
44007008	Baha ningkara Gâd mita Ebraham wal lâ kum daukan, bara baha lâka aisin tukinka ba yan. Baha mita sika Ebraham mita Aisak baikan bara yu 8 alkan bara, sirkumsisan daukan. Aisak sin ai luhpia Jekob ra sin baku daukan, bara Jekob ai luhpia 12 nani ra sin sirkumsisan daukan. Witinka nani sika Israel kyamka 12 nani aisika nani kan ba.
44007009	"Bara Jekob luhpia nani wan damika nani kan ba mita ai muihni Josep ra tuman, ban sin witin ba atkan Idsipt ra kat brihwaia, kuna Gâd lika Josep wal ban kan.
44007010	Bamna Gâd mita trabil nani sut wina swaki saki kan, sins laka ba yan, ban sin Idsipt kingka Fero mita yamni kaikaia ba sin. Bara Josep lika Idsipt wihtka tara mangkan, bara king Fero dukya aiska wihtka sin.
44007011	"Bamna plun tiwan tara, sari tara pali sin balan, Idsipt tasbaia aiskara, Kenan tasbaia aiskara sin, bamna wan damika nani plun piaia apu kan.
44007012	Sakuna Jekob walan Idsipt ra lika plun ma manas bara sa, bamna witin mita ai luhpia nani wan damika nani wi ba bahara blikan wan. Naha na pas trip impakan kata.
44007013	Kli aima walara wan bara, Josep lika ai muihni nani ra param takan, bara Idsipt kingka kaikan Josep ba ya kyamka ba.
44007014	Bamna Josep mita blikan wan, ai aisika bara ai taya nani 75 ba sut brih balaia.
44007015	Baku sika Jekob Idsipt ra wih iwan, bara ban pruan. Wan damika nani sin bahara pruan.
44007016	Ai wîna tara nani ba Sikem ra brisi bikan, baha raitika Ebraham mita Hemor luhpia nani wina atkan ba Sikem tasbaia ra.
44007017	"Gâd Ebraham ra swir taki kira pramis munan yua ba pat aimakaia man kan bara, Israel nisanka ba Idsipt ra ailal pali sahwan kan.
44007018	Bara Idsipt ra king kum mangkan ba, witin Josep tanka kaikras kan.
44007019	Naha kingka mita wan taya nani ra kunin munan, bara wan damika nani ra sin rau pali munan, ai luhpia nani nan aisubi sakuya bani ba lulki swika prubia.
44007020	Baha sin pyua ra sika Moses aisubi takan. Naha tuktika Gâd mita yamni kaikan kan, bara ai aisika nani ai watla ra kati yuhmpa yukuki paki kan.
44007021	Witin ba ban lulkaia kan, bara Idsipt kingka luhpia mairin mita brisi pakan ai luhpia baku.
44007022	Baha mita Moses ra Idsipt sinska laka nani sut ba smalkan kata, bamna witin lika sinskira bara diara daukaia sin karnika brikan.
44007023	"Moses pat mani 40 bri kan bara, witin ai uplika Israel nani ba kaikan pali daukan.
44007024	Sakuna witin kaikan, Idsipt waitnika kum mita Israel waitnika kum ra saura rausauhki kan; bara Moses taki wan ai uplika ba help munaia wisi bara Idsipt waitnika ba ikan.
44007025	Witin luki kan ai muihni Israel nani ba lukbia, nahki witin mita Gâd witin nani ba pri sakbia, sakuna witin nani baha tanka briras kan.
44007026	Yu wala, Moses kaikan Israel waitnika wal lika aiklabi kan, bara witin brin dauki kan baha nani wal sut ba kupia kumi daukaia, bara ban win: 'Man nani wal sut ba muihkam apia? Diakan pana, pana wînam ra rausauhki sma?'
44007027	Bara witinka ai muihni ra rausauhki kan ba Moses ra platukbi tnayara laki, win: 'Ya mita man ba wihta mai mangkan, wan laka sin aisi daukaia?
44007028	Man yang ra sin ai ikaia lukisma ki, sin nahwala Idsipt waitnika ra ikram ba baku?'
44007029	Naha walan bara, Moses mahka plapan Midian tasbaia ra. Witin bahara trengsar baku iwan, bara ai luhpia waitna wal sin sakan.
44007030	"Mani 40 ningkara, upla iwras tasbaia Sainai ilka lamara, insal kum witin ra latan takan, kyaya dusa kumi ra pauta klauhwi kan tilara.
44007031	Moses baha diara aihka kaikan bara ta iwan, kuna dia dukya sapa pain kaikaia wisi witin kau lama ra wan, bara Dawan bila baikra naku witin walan:
44007032	'Yang ra sika man damikam nani Gâdkam ba, Ebraham, Aisak, Jekob Gâdka sin.' Bara Moses lika sibrin mita tatatwi kan, sip sin taui kaikras kan.
44007033	Bara Dawan witin ra win: 'Man minam wina suskam ba daiks, kan man minam taibisma pliska ba, hulikira sa bamna.
44007034	Yang upliki nani Idsipt ra pât wauhwi ba kaikri, bara ai bila saki ini ba sin walri, bamna yang bal iwri witin nani ba pri sakaia. Bamna bal, yang Idsipt ra mai blikaisna.'
44007035	"Naha Moseska na ra sika Israel uplika nani mita bahki kulkata ba, naku sin makabi walata ba: 'Man na ya mita wan purara wihta bara lâ dadaukra kaia mai mangkan?' Baha Moseska sika Gâd mita wihta bara upla pri sasakra baku blikan, insal witin ra latan takan kyaya dusa ra pauta baku klauhwi kan ba tilara.
44007036	Moses kata sika wan damika nani Idsipt wina sakan ba. Baha tasbaia ra witin lika wark aihka nani bara sain nani sin daukan, Kabu Pauni ra, ban upla iwras tasbaia ra sin mani 40 kan pyua ra.
44007037	Naha sin Moses ka sika Israel uplika nani ra nan wisata ba: 'Gâd mita dahra aisasara kum mai blikbia, man nani muihkam nani tila wina, sin yang ai blikan baku. Man nani witin bila wali bas.'
44007038	Moses kata sika upla iwras tasbaia ra upla nani tilara kan ba; bara Sainai ilka ra baha insalka witin ra aisin ba, wan damika nani ba wal sin bara kan. Witin sika raya kaia bila nani ba brin yawan ra wankaia dukyara.
44007039	"Sakuna wan damika nani witin bila walras kan, kau ni platukbi tnayara lakisi, witin nani mahka kli Idsipt ra taui waia lukan.
44007040	Baku bara Eran ra witin nani mita win: 'Yang nani want sna, gâd nani dauki wankma, wan kainara impakaia dukyara; kan yang nani kaikras baha Moses ka Idsipt wina wan sakan ba mapara dia takan sapa.'
44007041	Bamna witin nani mita bip lilka kum daukan, daîwan nani sin ikan baha lilkara sakripais daukaia. Witin nani sin uya lilia pali taki bangwan, baha ai mihta ni lilka daukan ba dukyara.
44007042	Bara Gâd witin nani wina tnayara takan, ban sin swin kasbrika purara ba slilmika nani ra ni ai pura sunaia. Baku sin dahra aisasara nani wauhkataya nani ra ulban sa: 'Man nani Israel uplika nani, daîwan nani iki bangwi, sakripais dauki katma ba 40 mani upla iwras tasbaia ra, baha ba yang ra lika apia.
44007043	Sakuna Molok gâdka wal prawaia watla sika man nani twilki bangwi katma ba, bara Ripan gâdka nani slilma lilka ba sin, baha lilka ra man nani mihtam ni daukram ba, bahara puram suni mayunaia wisi. Baha mita man nani tasbaiam pali wina mai saki, lai Babilun kuntrika ra mai blikamna.'
44007044	"Upla iwras tasbaia ra wan damika nani, Gâd upla wal lâ daukan tentka watla ba bri kan. Baha ba baku makan, Gâd mita Moses ra win baha nahki makaia patranka dauki marikan baku.
44007045	Baha ningkara, wan damika nani baha tentka watla ba utla pahni baku brin ai aisika nani wina, Jasua wal balan uplika nani ba sin baha brih balan, witin nani tasba wala nani uplika pura luan pyua. Baha nani Gâd mita witin nani mawan wina kangbi sakan ba, bara ban wan Debit yua nani ra kat.
44007046	King Debit lika Gâd wina help brin, bamna witin want kan Jekob Gâdka iwaika watla kum paskaia.
44007047	Sakuna Salaman sika Gâd watla ba paskan.
44007048	Ban sakuna, Gâd lai purara iwi ba, witin upla ai mihta ni paskan watla satka ra dimi iwras. Dahra aisasara aisin ba baku:
44007049	'Kasbrika purara ba yang king iwaiki sa, tasba ba lika mini taibaika sa. Bamna dia sat watla man nani paski aikaisma ki? Baku Dawan wisa. Ani pliska ra yang wingki puhbaia kamna ki?
44007050	Naha diara nani sut yang mihti ni daukri apia?'
44007051	"Sakuna --Stiben lika ban aisi wi kan-- man nani lika pyua bani kupiam karna brisma. Man nani kyama nani bara kupiam sin brisma, sin baha nani Gâd kakaira apia uplika nani ba baku. Pyua bani Spirit Hulikira mapara. Man nani lika damikam nani wal baku pali sma.
44007052	Man nani damikam nani ani dahra aisasara ra nani ra lika saura munras kan ki? Damikam nani mita ikan, baha nani baha kasakkira balaia dukyara aisi bangwi kan bara. Witinka ba balan bara, man nani waihlam saki upla mihta ra mangki, ikram.
44007053	Man nani sika insal nani bak lâ briram, sakuna bila walras sma.
44007054	Witin nani naha diara nani walan bara, ai kupia sauhkan, ai napa nani sin arkban Stiben ba mapara.
44007055	Sakuna Stiben, Spirit Hulikira ni bangwan kan, kasbrika purara kaikan, bara Gâd prana ba kaikan, Jisas sin kaikan ai aisa mihta aihkika tani ra bui kan.
44007056	Bara win: --Man nani kais! Yang kasbrika pura ba kwawan kan kaikisni, bara Upla Luhpia waitna ba sin Gâd mihta aihkika ra bui ra.
44007057	Sakuna witin nani ai kyama nani ba prakan, bara aitabaiki wini, Stiben mapara plapi wan.
44007058	Bara taun ba wina saki, walpa ni sabi kan. Bamna witnis nani naha diara daukan ba ai kwalka nani ba waitna wahma kumi nina Sâl, bahara yan main kaikaia.
44007059	Witin nani mita walpa ni sabi kan bara, Stiben ai pura suni win: "Dawan Jisas, yang spiritki na man mihtam ra bris."
44007060	Baha ningkara, witin ai lula kriki ai bila baikra karna wini aisin: "Dawan, naha saurka na witin nani ra kulkpara!" Bara naha aisin ningkara, pruan.
44008001	Bara Sâl bara kan, Stiben pruanka ra luki aitani tanka yabisa. Bara baha sin yua, Jerusalem ra serts bara kan ba mapara rau sauhkan tara pali buan. Lalukra nani ban plis, plis ra plapan, Judia bara Sameria tasbaia nani ra; sakuna apastil nani lika bara kan.
44008002	Waitna kasakkira nani mita Stiben wîna tara ba raiti ra brisi bikan, kasak sin sari taki bangwan.
44008003	Bara Sâl lika kau ban serts ra rausauhki kan; witin utla banira dimi tauki kan, waitna apia kaka mairin kra sakbia kaka, raski saki silak ra mangkaia dukiara.
44008004	Lalukra nani plis, plis ra plapan ba mita ani anira wan bara swaki sakan sturka yamni ba smalki kan.
44008005	Pilip lika Sameria taunka kumi ra wih mahka Kraist sturka upla nani ra aisi kan.
44008006	Upla nani bal asla taki kan ba, sut lika Pilip dia aisi kan ba kat aman wali kan, sain aihka nani dauki kan ba sin kaikan.
44008007	Upla ailal spirit taski bri kan ba rakan kan. Spirit taski nani ba ai bila baikra karna winikira upla nani wina taki kan. Bara wakia lawan nani bara skahwa nani sin rakan.
44008008	Baha taka mita baha taunka ba lilia kan.
44008009	Sakuna baha taunka ra waitna kum kan nina ba Saiman, bara kan pyua ra witin lika sukia aimaki kan. Sameria uplika nani ra kasak kunin muni kan. Aisi kan witin ba upla tara kum sa.
44008010	Upla sut, tuktan sirpi nani, bara almuk nani sin, witin ra aman pali wali kan. Bara witin nani naku aisin ba: "Nahamna bah upla nani aisi ba 'Gâd karnakira tara ba'."
44008011	Baku upla nani ba ai bila wali kan, kan pyua wihka wina sukia aimaki upla nani ra kunin muni kan.
44008012	Sakuna Pilip mita Gâd King aimaki ba, Jisas Kraist sturka sin smalkanka wali kasak lukan bara sut tahbi daukan, waitna nani bara mairin nani sin.
44008013	Baha Saiman ka sin kasak lukan bara tahbi daukan, bara witin Pilip wal ban tauki kan. Witin ta iwan pali sin taki kan baha sain nani bara wark aihka nani dauki kan ba dukyara.
44008014	Apastil nani Jerusalem ra bangwi kan ba walan, nahki Sameria uplika nani sin sturi yamni ba brin, bara bahara Pita, Jan wal blikan.
44008015	Witin nani wan bara, ai pura sunan, Sameria ra lalukra nani ba Spirit Hulikira bribia dukyara.
44008016	Kan baha uplika nani ra Spirit Hulikira ba kau iwras kan bamna, tahbi baman daukan kan Dawan Jisas nina ra.
44008017	Bamna Pita Jan wal mita baha nani purara ai mihta nani kahban, bara Spirit Hulikira brin.
44008018	Saiman kaikan apastil nani mita ai mihta nani upla nani ra kahbaia bara, Spirit Hulikira ba bal iwi kan, bamna witin bui Pita, Jan wal ra lalah mariki win:
44008019	--Yang ra sin baha karnika ba aik, bara ani, ani uplika purara mihti nani kahbamna kaka, witin sin Spirit Hulikira ba bribia.
44008020	Pita bila: --Man lalahkam ba wal pat kat wama, Gâd mita yabi dukya ba lalah ni atkaia lukisma bamna.
44008021	Yang nani warkki na tilara, man dukyam briaia wiria sin apu sa, kan man kupiam ba Gâd tanira kasak apia sma bamna.
44008022	Naha saurka na swisi Dawan ra puram suns, bara bankra witin baha kupiam ra lukram ba swih tikbia.
44008023	Yang kaikisni man lika kupiam tahplika ni bangwram pali sa, bara saurka laka mita priski mai brisa.
44008024	Bara Saiman pana aisin: --Man nani Dawan ra yang dukira puram suns, baha saurka ai wiram ba kumi sin ai takbia apia.
44008025	Apastil nani ba witnis aisin, bara Dawan bila sin smalkan. Ba wina witin nani Sameria taunka sirpi nani sut ra sin swaki sakan laka sturka ba smalkan. Baha ningkara, kli Jerusalem ra taui wan.
44008026	Naha ningkara, Dawan insalka kumi Pilip ra win: "Man bus bara waupasa tanira was, baha yabalka Jerusalem wina Gesa ra iwi auya bak." Naha yabalka na lika upla iwras tasbaia ra sa.
44008027	Pilip mahka ridi taki wan. Witin auya kan bara, yabal ra Itiupia kuntrika wina waitna kum wal prawan. Witin ba sin yunuk kata, Itiupia kwinka Kandesi suliarka nani wihtka tara kum kan. Witin sin Itiupia kwinka ba lalahka main kakaira kan, bara witin na Jerusalem ra balan Gâd ra ai pura sunaia.
44008028	Naha waitna ai taunka mata kli ai bila tauan bara, witin ai karka bilara, dahra aisasara Aiseya ulban wauhkataya ba aisi kaiki kan.
44008029	Bara Spirit Huli mita Pilip ra win: "Man baha karka ba lamara was."
44008030	Pilip plapi lamara wan bara walan, dahra aisasara Aiseya wauhkataya wina aisi kaiki kan, bara makabi walan: --Man aisi kaikisma ba tanka brisma ki?
44008031	Waitnika ba bila: --Nahki sip kamna tanka briaia, tanka ai wiaia uplika ba apu na? Bamna witin Pilip ra makaban ai waginka ra uli ai lamara iwbia.
44008032	Ulbanka pis witin aisi kaiki kan ba lika naku kata: "Witin ba syîp baku ikaia pliska ra brih wan kata; syîp luhpia bilas baku ai tawa aîrbra ba mawanra kan, baku sin witin ai bila kwaki diara aisaras kan.
44008033	Witin mayara bauan, sakuna ai laka ba wapni daukras. Bamna ai kyamka ba dukyara aisaia upla apu sa, ai rayaka ba naha tasba wina sakan sa bamna."
44008034	Bara Itiupia waitna ba mita Pilip ra makabi walan: --Man pliskam ai wis, naha dahra aisasara na ya dukyara aisisa ki? Witin ai dukyara, apia kaka, upla wala dukyara?
44008035	Bara Pilip mita mahka baha Ulbanka pis aisi kaiki kan ba wina Jisas dukyara aisin.
44008036	Witin nani ban impaki li bara kan pliska kum ra balan, bara yunuk ba bila: --Li nahara sa, bara aitani kabia apia ki tahbi ai daukaia?
44008037	[Pilip bila: --Man kupiam aiska ni kasak lukisma kaka, man sip sma. Bara waiknika ba bila: --Yang kasak lukisni, Jisas Kraist ba Gâd Luhpya sa.]
44008038	Bamna Itiupia waitnika adar yan, kar ba takaskbia, bara wal sut kar ba wina iwan. Bahara Pilip mita tahbi daukan.
44008039	Witin nani li wina ulan bara, Dawan Spiritka mita Pilip ba brihwan, bara waitnika witin ra kli kaikras kan; sakuna witin ai auyapah ai yabalka ra impakan.
44008040	Pilip ai dahra walan, witin ba Asotus ra kan. Bamna witin taun banira wapi, sturi yamni ba smalki ban Sesaria kat wan.
44009001	Baha pali pyua ra, Sâl lika Dawan ra luki uplika nani ra rausauhki, ikaia sin pliki kan. Bamna witin prîst tara ra wan.
44009002	Bara la daukaia karnika wauhkataya nani makaban, witin baha ba wal Damaskus sinagog watla nani ra wih plikaia, baha nani sturi yamni nina bliki ba sut alki Jerusalem ra bri sal silak ra atia mangkaia, waitna nani sapa, mairin nani sapa.
44009003	Sakuna witin yabal ra auya kan, pat sin Damaskus lamara balan bara, kasbrika purara ba wina ingni kum bal witinra kir ingwan.
44009004	Bamna Sâl tasba kat kauhwan, bara bila baikra kumi walan witin ra naku aisi kan: "Sâl, Sâl, diakan man rau ai sauhkisma ki?"
44009005	Bara Sâl pana makabi walan: "Man ba ya sma ki, Dawan?" Bara bila baikra ba naku win: "Yang sika Jisas, man yang ra sika rau ai sauhkisma ba.
44009006	Man mahka bui taun ra dims, baha ra mai wibia man dia daukaia sma ba."
44009007	Waitna nani Sâl wal impaki kan ba sut ta iwan pali takan, kan witin nani bila baikra walan, sakuna upla kumi sin kaikras kan.
44009008	Ningkara Sâl tasba wina buan, sakuna ai nakra kwakan bara, sip diara kaikras pali kan. Baku bara witin nani mita ai mihta ra alki Damaskus ra brihwan.
44009009	Bahara yu yuhmpa kan diara sip kaikras, plun piras, diara sin diras.
44009010	Damaskus ra lalukra kum iwi kata ai nina ba Ananaias; witin ra Dawan mita diara aihka mariki nan win: "Ananaias!" Bara witin pana win: "Nara sni, Dawan."
44009011	Bara Dawan mita nan win: "Man bus bara yabal kum nina Wapni wi ba kat was, bara Judas watla ra wama bara, Tarsus wina waitnika kum nina Sâl wi ba dukyara makabi wals. Witin ai pura sunisa,
44009012	bara diara aihka kaikan, nahki waitna kumi nina Ananaias wi ba bal dimi ai mihta nani witin ra kahbaia, kli ai nakra diara kaikbia wisi."
44009013	Naha walan bara, Ananaias bila: "Dawan, baha waitnika dukyara upla ailal ai win, nahki diara saura manas daukan, man uplikam nani Jerusalem ra iwi nani ba mapara.
44009014	Bara nanara witin Damaskus ra aula kan, prîst tara nani wina karnika brih, baha nani man ninam ra ai pura suni nani ba alki priski silak ra brihwaia."
44009015	Sakuna Dawan bila: "Man was; yang baha waitnika ba pliki sakri sa, yang dukira witnis aisaia, nisan wala nani ra bara ai kingka nani ra, bara Israel nani ra sin.
44009016	Yang mita witin ra marikamna nahki pât nani uya yang dukira wauhwaia ba."
44009017	Bamna Ananaias wan Sâl bara kan ba watla kat. Witin diman, bara ai mihta nani witin ra kahbi, win: --Muihni Sâl, man aulma kapram bara yabal ra Dawan Jisas wal prawram ba mita ai blikan man namkra kli yamni briaia, bara Spirit Hulikira ni sin aibangwma dukyara.
44009018	Baha pali pyua ra ai nakra nani wina inska taya nani baku kauhwan, bara kli sip kan diara kaikaia. Bamna Sâl mahka buan, bara tahbi sin daukan kan.
44009019	Baha ningkara plun pin, ai karnika sin brin, bara lalukra nani Damaskus ra kata nani ba wal yu kulki takaskan.
44009020	Ningkara Sâl lika mahka prias watla nani ra smalkan. Witin aisin Jisas ba kasak Gâd Luhpia sa.
44009021	Baha nani wali kan ba sut aihka luki nan win: --Naha sin waitnika apia, Jerusalem ra Jisas nina maki ai pura suni nani ra rausauhki kata ba? Bara nahara sin balan apia baha nani alki priski brisi prîst tara nani mihta ra mangkaia?
44009022	Sakuna Sâl lika kau karnakira smalki mariki kan, Jisas ba Mesaia sa. Ju nani Damaskus ra iwi nani kan ba sut pana sip diara aisaras kan.
44009023	Yu ailal luan ningkara, Ju nani ai manka asla taki lâ daukan Sâl ba ikaia.
44009024	Sakuna witin mita baha walan. Kakna, tihmia sin witin nani taun wina takaia getka ra aihwaki bangwi kan witin ra ikaia.
44009025	Sakuna lalukra nani mita pataki tara kum bilara mangki, taun walpaia kutbanka bak alahbi ikan latara, bara baku witin ba swak takan.
44009026	Sâl Jerusalem ra wan bara, trai kaikan lalukra nani wal asla takaia, sakuna sut mita witin ra sîbri kan. Witin nani mita pain lukras kan, Sâl ba kasak Dawan ra tauan sapa.
44009027	Ban sakuna, Barnabas bui witin ba apastil nani ra brisi mariki win, nahki yabal ra Dawan wal prawan ba, bara nahki sin Dawan Sâl ra aisin ba, bara Damaskus ra sin witin sibrin apu kira Jisas nina bri maki smalkan ba.
44009028	Bamna Sâl Jerusalem ra takaskan, lalukra nani aikuki sin asla tauki kan.
44009029	Witin ai kupia aiska ni Dawan nina bri maki aisi kan, bara Ju uplika Grîk bila aisi nani ba wal aisi blahwi kan, bamna baha nani mita trai muni kan witin ba ikaia.
44009030	Wan muihni nani mita naha na kaikan bara, Sâl ba Sesaria ra brihwan, baha wina Tarsus ra blikan wan.
44009031	Bamna serts ba, Judia ra, Galili ra, Sameria ra, baha tasbaia aiska ba kupia kumi spirit bri pawi kan. Witin nani Dawan sibrinka ra iwi bangwikan, Spirit Hulikira helpka ra, bara kau ailal taki kan.
44009032	Pita aimaki wan muihni nani ba kaikaia. Witin Lida ra sin wan, lalukra nani bahara iwi kan ba kaikaia.
44009033	Baha ra witin waitna kum wal prawan nina Inîas, witin 8 mani krikrira prawi kan, wakia lawan sikniska brikan bamna.
44009034	Bara Pita bila: --Inîas, Jisas Kraist mai rakuya, bamna mita krikrikam ba pain dauks. Baha pali pyua ra Inîas mahka buan.
44009035	Bamna Lida ra bara Sarun ra iwi nani ba bui witin ba kaikan, bara sut ai lukanka almuk nani ba mahka swisi, Dawan nina blikan.
44009036	Baha pyua ra, Jupa taunka ra lalukra mairin kum kan ai nina ba Tabita, Grîk bilara lika Dorkas maki kan. Naha mairka ai rayaka yua nani aiskara diara yamni man dauki kan, upla umpira nani ra sin uya help muni kan.
44009037	Baha yua nani ra Dorkas ba siknis alkan bara pruan, bamna ai wîna tara ba tahbi saki muni, brisi pura rûm kum ra dingki tnikan.
44009038	Jupa lika Lida taunka wal baila kan, bara lalukra nani Jupa ra iwi kan ba walan, Pita lika Lida ra sa. Bamna waitna wal saki blikan, naku maisapahkaia: "Pliskam takaskras, Jupa ra bal."
44009039	Bara Pita witin nani aikuki wan. Witin balan bara, brihwan wîna tara tnikan ba rûmka kat. Pyarka nani sut witin ra bal ai tnayara kir bui, ini mariki kan prak nani, kwala wala nani sin Dorkas mita kau raya kan pyua ra sipan nani ba.
44009040	Ningka ra, Pita win baha nani sut ba latara takbia, bara witin ai lula kriki ai pura sunan. Mairka pruan ba kat kaiki, nan win: --Tabita, man mahka bus! Bamna mairka ba ai nakra ilingki Pita ra taui kaikan, bara mahka bui iwan.
44009041	Pita bui mairka ba mihta ra alki bukan; ningkara lalukra nani bara pyarka nani ba sut paiwan balan, witin nani ra marikan Tabita ba kli rawan sa.
44009042	Naha sturka na Jupa taunka aiskara wali bangwan, upla ailal sin Dawan ra kasak lukan.
44009043	Bara Pita lika yu ailal baha taunka ra takaskan, daîwan taya lakaia saîka dadingkra kum nina Saiman wi ba watla ra.
44010001	Sesaria taunka ra waitna kumi bara kan nina ba Kornilius, witin lika Rom suldawa daknika kaptenka kata, nina Itali wina ba.
44010002	Witin lika ai watla uplika aikuki Gâd ra sibrin luki mayuni kan. Witin sin lalah uya yan Ju uplika umpira nani ra help munaia, ban sin Gâd ra ai pura suni kan.
44010003	Yu kumi tutni 3 aklak kan ra, diara aihka kumi kaikan param pali, nahki Gâd insalka kum witin bara kan ba kat bal diman, bara win: "Kornilius!"
44010004	Bamna Kornilius sîbrinki ra pali insal ra kat ban kaiki, makabi walan: "Dawan, dia ki?" Bara insal ba bila: "Gâd pain kaikan, man puram sunram ba, bara Ju uplika umpira nani ra sin help munisma ba sut.
44010005	Bamna man waitna nani bliks Jupa ra, Saiman nina wala Pita wi ba bri balaia.
44010006	Witin ba Saiman wala daîwan taya saîka dadingkra ba wal takaskisa, baha watla ba sin kabu un ra sa."
44010007	Baha ningkara, insal witin wal aisi kata ba mahka wan bara, Kornilius mita ai albika wal winan, bara suldawa kum sin Gâd ra sibrin luki kan ba, yu bani witin wal kan ya ba.
44010008	Diara nani sut takan ba maisapahkisi, baha nani ba Jupa ra blikan.
44010009	Yu wala witin nani impaki pat Jupa lamara balan bara, yu ba 12 aklak baku kan, Pita mita utla bahna ra uli wan, ai pura sunaia.
44010010	Witin plun uya pali dauki kan, mahka sin piaia luki kan. Sakuna ai pata ba kau ridi daukras kan pyua ra, diara aihka kum kaikan.
44010011	Witin kaikan kasbrika pura ba kwawan, bara kwala pis tara baku kum, ta wahlwal wilkan naha tasba kat alahbi ikan.
44010012	Baha kwalka bilara daîwan sat, sat bara kan, mina wahlwal bri nani, pyuta nani, tnawira nani sin.
44010013	Bara bila baikra kum walan: "Pita, bus, bara iki pis!"
44010014	Sakuna Pita pana win: "Apia pali Dawan, yang kau aima kumi sin bahmuna dukya saura taski nani ba sat piras."
44010015	Bila baikra kata ba kli aima walara aisin, naku walan: "Gâd mita diara klin daukan ba, man taski wipara."
44010016	Naha diara na aima yuhmpa marikisi, kwalka kata ba kli kasbrika pura ra uli wan.
44010017	Baha diara aihka kaikan ba dukyara Pita kau ai kupia wal aisi kan bara, Kornilius blikan waitnika nani pat dur ra bui bangwi kan, witin nani Saiman watla ba ani sapa makabi wali kan.
44010018	Witin nani ai bila baikra karna wini makabi wali kan, Saiman nina wala Pita wi ba baha watla ra takaskisa sapa.
44010019	Sakuna Pita lika diara aihka kaikan ba dukyara kau ai kupia wal aisi kan bara, Spirit Hulikira bila: "Kais, waitna yuhmpa mai plikisa.
44010020	Man mahka bui munhta ra iwi wih, baha nani wal was. Nahmpa, nahmpa sin lukpara, kan yang mita baha waitnika nani ba blikri sa bamna."
44010021	Bamna Pita munhta ra iwi wan, bara Kornilius mita blikan waitnika nani ra win: --Man nani plikisma waitnika ba sika yang; dia pali dukyara man nani na balram ki?
44010022	Witin nani bila: --Kapten Kornilius mita ai blikan. Witin waitna kasakkira, Gâd ra sin sibrin lukisa, Ju nani sut mita sin witin ra latwan kaikisa. Bamna Dawan insalka kumi mita witin ra win man mai paiwbia ai watla ra wama, bara dia, dia aisama ba witin walbia.
44010023	Bara Pita mita waitna nani ba yan utla ra diman, tihmia sin aikuki bahara yapi lalauan. Yu wala titan, Pita bara wan muihni nani tila Jupa wina sin, witin nani aikuki wan.
44010024	Yu wala witin nani Sesaria ra diman, bahara sika Kornilius witin bila kaiki kan ba, ai taya nani, bara ai uplika nani sin kau witin wal asla nani ba kan paiwan.
44010025	Pita utla ra dimaia baila kan bara, Kornilius taki wan wal prawaia, ban ai lula kriki ai mawanra kauhwi witin ra mayunan.
44010026	Sakuna Pita mita alki buki, win: --Minam ra bus, yang na upla, sin man wal baku.
44010027	Witin wal ban aisi utla ra diman bara, kaikan upla ailal bahara asla takan kan.
44010028	Bara Pita bila: --Man nani pain kaikisma, Ju sertska ba lâ yaras sa, Ju uplika kum, Ju apia uplika kum wal asla takaia, apia kaka watla ra kra dimaia. Sakuna Gâd mita ai marikan yang upla kumi ra saura apia kaka taski sin wimna apia.
44010029	Baha mita, man nani ai paiwram bara, takaskras mahka balri diara kumi sin aisaras. Bamna yang walaia want sna, man nani dia dukyara ai paiwram sapa.
44010030	Bara Kornilius bila: --Pat yu wahlwal sa, sin naha awarka baku kan, yang waitla nara tutni pura sunra dauki kapri, waitna kumi kwala ingnikira dimi yang ra latan takan.
44010031	Bara naku ai win: 'Kornilius, Gâd man puram sunra ba walan, bara ai kupia sin krauan man mita upla umpira nani ra help munisma ba.
44010032	Bamna Jupa taunka ra upla bliks, Saiman nina wala Pita maki ba bri balaia. Witin ba takaskisa Saiman wala daîwan taya saîka dadingkra ba watla ra, baha watla ba kabu un ra sa.'
44010033	Baha mita mahka blikri man mai plikaia, bamna man aitani pali balram. Nanara yang nani sut nahara bangwisni Gâd mawanra, man ra Dawan mita dia maikka aisama ba walaia.
44010034	Bara Pita mahka aisi win: --Nanara kasak pali kaikisni, Gâd mapara upla satka kumi upla sat wala ba wal aihka apia sa,
44010035	sakuna witin pain kulkisa ani nisanka witin ra sibrin luki diara pain sin dauki ba.
44010036	Bamna Gâd Israel kyamka nani ra win, Jisas Kraist bak kupia kumi laka ba maisapahkan, witin ka yawan sut wan Dawanka ba.
44010037	Man nani sut pain kaikisma, Judia tasbaia aiskara dia taki ba, Galili ra pas daukan ba, tahbi daukaia lâ ba briaia sa Jan mita smalkan ba ningkara.
44010038	Man nani kaikisma Gâd Jisas Nasaret wina bara Spirit Hulikira karnika yan ba, witinka diara pain man dauki tauki kan, bara baha nani debil karnika munuhnta ra pat wauhwi kan ba sut rakan. Baku daukaia sip kan, Gâd witin wal kan bamna.
44010039	Yang nani lika dia, dia Jisas daukan ba witniska nani sika, Judia tasbaia aiskara, ban Jerusalem taunka ra sin. Baha sut ningkara, upla nani witin ba dus prihni pami ikan.
44010040	Sakuna yu yuhmpa ra Gâd witin ba pruan wina kli bukan, bara sin yang nani ra latan takan.
44010041	Upla sut ra lika param takras kan, sakuna yang nani ra lika. Gâd mita kan wina yang nani na bak ai sakan, witnis kaia ba dukya ra. Jisas pruan wina buan ningkara, yang nani aikuki plun piri, diara sin dih bangwri.
44010042	Bara yang nani ai blikan upla nani ra smalkaia, witnis sin aisaia, nahki Gâd mita naha Jisaska na raya nani bara pruan nani sut Wihtka mangkan sa.
44010043	Bamna patitara pyua ba wina, dahra aisasara nani sin Jisas tanka naku aisin: 'Ya, ya witin ra luki ba, ai nina karnika ba mita saurka nani sut swih tikan kabia.'
44010044	Pita kau aisi kan bara, Spirit Hulikira bal iwan baha nani witin ra wali nani kan ba sut ra.
44010045	Ju lalukra nani Pita wal balan kan ba ta iwan, Spirit Hulikira ba Ju apia uplika nani ra sin yabuya ba dukyara.
44010046	Witin nani walan, baha nani bila sat wala nani aisi, Gâd ra sin mayuni kan.
44010047	Baku bara Pita aisin: --Upla sip kabia ki naha nani tahbi daukaia ba wina takaskaia, witin nani pat Spirit Hulikira brin na yawan baku?
44010048	Bara adar yan, baha nani ba Jisas Kraist nina ra tahbi daukaia. Baha ningkara, Pita ra makaban yu wiria pan witin nani wal takaskaia.
44011001	Apastil nani bara wan muihni nani Judia ra nani kan ba sturi walan, nahki Ju apia nani sin Dawan sturka yamni ba brin.
44011002	Pita kli Jerusalem ra balan bara, Ju lalukra nani mita witin mapara buan,
44011003	bara win: --Diakan man Ju apia nani ba watla ra waram, aikuki sin plun piram?
44011004	Bara Pita lika dia takan ba ta wina tnata kat, naku win:
44011005	--Yang Jupa taunka ra puri suni kapri bara, diara aihka kum kaikri, kasbrika purara ba wina diara kum bal iwuya kan kwala tara kum baku, ta wahlwal ba sut wilkan kan, ban yang bara kapri pliska kat bal iwan.
44011006	Yang lama palira wari, bilara dia bara sapa kaikaia, bara kaikri daîwan mina wahlwal bri nani ba, daîwan kraskira nani, pyuta nani, tnawira nani sin.
44011007	Bara bila baikra kum walri nan win: 'Pita, man bus, bara iki pis.'
44011008	Sakuna yang wiri: 'Apia, Dawan, kan kau aima kumi sin bili ra mangkras bahmuna diara saura, taski nani ba.'
44011009	Bara kasbrika pura ba wina bila baikra ba kli aima walara ai win: 'Gâd mita klin daukan dukya ba, man taski wipara.'
44011010	Naha diara na aima yuhmpa takan ba ningkara, diara nani sut kli kasbrika purara brihwan.
44011011	Baha sin pali pyua ra yang nani takaski kapri ba watla ra waitna yuhmpa wan, Sesaria wina yang ai pliki blikan kan.
44011012	Bara Spirit Hulikira ba mita ai win, witin nani ba wal wamna takaskras pali. Bamna naha wan muihni nani 6 na sin yang wal wan. Yang nani sut Kornilius watla ra dimi bangwri.
44011013	Witin ba mita yang nani ra ai win, ai watla ra insal kumi ai tnayara kan ba mita win: 'Waitna nani Jupa taunka ra bliks, Saiman nina wala Pita wi ba bri balaia,
44011014	bara witin mita mai wibia nahki sip kama swaki mai sakan kaia, man bara wamtla uplika aiska.'
44011015	Yang mahka aisari bara, Spirit Hulikira witin nani sut purara bal iwan, sin ta pali pyua ra yang nani purira bal iwata ba baku.
44011016	Bara yang kupi krauan Dawan naku aisin ba dukyara: 'Kasak pali Jan lika li ni upla tahbi daukan, sakuna man nani lika Spirit Hulikira ni mai tahbi mai daukan kabia.'
44011017	Bamna baha lika param sa, Gâd mita baha nani ra spirit Hulikira yan, sin yawan Dawan Jisas Kraist ra kasak lukan bara wankan ba baku. Bamna yang na yamna Gâd mapara buaia?
44011018	Bara wan muihni nani Jerusalem ra nani ba naha sturka walan bara, mapara aisi kata ba sap takan, Gâd ra ni mayuni, nan win: --Baku sa kaka, Gâd mita Ju apia nani ra sin sans yaban ai kupia lakaia, bara raya ban kaia laka briaia.
44011019	Stiben ikan ningkara, lalukra wala nani ra sin mahka rausauhkan, bamna tila nani ba Pinisia ra, Saiprus ra, bara Antiok ra sin plapan. Bahara Jisas sturka yamni ba Ju uplika nani ra baman smalkan, Ju apia nani ra lika apia.
44011020	Sakuna lalukra nani tila Saiprus bara Sairini wina kan ba mita Antiok taunka ra wan, bahara Dawan Jisas swaki wan saki sturka ba Ju apia nani ra smalkan.
44011021	Dawan karnika ba witin nani purara kan, bamna upla manas ai lukanka almuk nani ba swisi, Dawan ra ni kasak lukan.
44011022	Bara naha sturka na Jerusalem ra serts bara ba kyama ra diman bara, witin nani mita Barnabas saki blikan Antiok ra.
44011023	Barnabas bahara wan bara, kaikan nahki Gâd upla nani ra ai yamnika yaban ba, bamna witin lilia kan. Bara mahka upla nani ra smalkan ai kupia aiska ni Dawan ra kasak lukaia tanka.
44011024	Barnabas lika waitna kum pain kata, witin Spirit Hulikira ni, kasak lukan laka ni sin aibangwan kan. Baha mita witin mita upla manas Dawan ra bri balan.
44011025	Baha ningkara, Barnabas ba Tarsus ra wan Sâl plikaia, bara wal prawan bara, witin ba Antiok ra brihwan.
44011026	Witin nani bahara serts uplika nani ba wal takaskan mani kum, ban upla nani ra sin smalki kan. Bamna Antiok ra sika pas lalukra nani nina kristian nani makan ba.
44011027	Baha pyua ra, Dawan wina sturi bri aisi uplika tila nani, Jerusalem wina Antiok ra wan.
44011028	Witin nani tila wina kumi nina Agabus, witin lika wan muihni nani lilapas kat buan, bara Spirit Hulikira mita yan aisin, nahki plun tiwan tara kum tasba aiska purara balbia. Baha ba kasak pali takan Klandius wihta tara aimaki kan pyua ra.
44011029	Bara lalukra nani Antiok ra iwi ba sut wilin takan help kum blikaia, Judia ra wan muihni iwi bangwi ba nani ra, kumi bani sip kan ba kat.
44011030	Baku bara witin nani mita Barnabas, Sâl wal mihta ra lalah ba mangki, Judia serts ta uplika nani ra blikan.
44012001	Baha pyua ra king Herad buan, serts uplika tila nani ra rausauhkaia.
44012002	Bamna witin mita Jan muihnika Jems ba alki, sord ni ikan.
44012003	Bara witin kaikan Ju nani sin baha ba pain kaikan, bamna Pita sin alki priskan. Baha yua ba lika brit lebin mangkras piaia yua kata.
44012004	Bamna Pita ba alki priskan ningkara, witin ba Herad mita silak ra mangkan. Bahara suldawa daknika wahlwal aihwaki kan, dakni bani ra suldawa wahlwal kata. Witin luki kan yua tara ba luka, upla nani mawanra sakaia.
44012005	Bamna Pita silak ra kan, aihwawakra nani mita sin pain aihwaki kaiki kan, sakuna serts uplika nani lika witin dukya ra Dawan ra karna pali ai pura suni kata.
44012006	Sin tihmika, Pita ba Herad mita upla nani mawanra saki brihwaia kan yua kainara, Pita lika mihta wal sut sen ni priskan, ban suldawa wal lilapas ra yapi kan. Suldawa wala nani lika dur ra aihwaki kan.
44012007	Tisku pali kan, Dawan insalka kum balan, bara silak watla ba ingni pali takan. Witin Pita tnaya mina ra tuski bara tatukbi, win: "Man aihni pali mahka bus!" Baha sin pali pyua ra Pita mihta ra sen kata ba tasba ra kauhwan.
44012008	Bara insal ba bila: "Man maisam ba pain wilks, bara suskam ba sin dingks." Bamna Pita naku daukan bara, insal ba bila: "Pramka tara ba dimi, nini ra bal."
44012009	Bamna Pita ban insal ba nina bliki silak watla wina takan, sakuna witin sip pain ai dara walras kan insal dauki ba kasak apia kaka bahki sapa. Witin lukan baha kaiki ba lika yaprisauhkan ra baku lukan.
44012010	Sakuna suldawa daknika pas taura kan ba luan, ningkara dakni wala kainara kan ba sin lui, ban latara takaia durka ayan ni daukan ba kat wan, bara dur ba kwawan. Witin nani taki yabalku auya kan, bara wan nakra klipan kumi bakura, insal ba lika Pita yakan swin.
44012011	Pita baha kat ai dara walan, bara win: "Nanara daira walisna baha ba kasak pali sa, Dawan mita ai insalka blikan, Herad mihta wina swaki ai sakaia, bara Ju uplika nani dia ai munaia luki kan ba wina sin."
44012012	Pita baha dukyara luki ban wapi, Jan, Mark yaptika Meri wi ba watla kat balan; bahara upla ailal asla taki ai pura suni kan.
44012013	Witin lata tani durka ra kingban, bara tuktan mairin kum nina Roda taki balan ya sapa kaikaia.
44012014	Witin lika Pita bila baikra ba pain tanka brin, sakuna uya lilia mita witin dur sin sakras kli plapi wan, bilara uplika nani ra maisapahkaia, Pita ba bal dur ra buisa.
44012015	Bara witin nani bila: --Man lika tanis! Sakuna tuktan mairin ba win: --Yang kasak pali mai wisna. Bamna witin nani bila: --Bankra witin apia, kuna ai insalka.
44012016	Sakuna Pita lika ban dur ra bui kingbi kan. Bara witin nani bal dur ba sakan bara, kaikan Pita kata, bamna witin nani sut ba ta iwan.
44012017	Sakuna Pita ai mihta ni sain munan sap kabia, bara maisapahkan nahki Dawan mita witin ba silak watla wina sakan tanka ba. Bara witin nani ra win: --Naha diara na Jems ra maisapahks bara wan muihni nani ra sin. Ningkara witin taki, plis walara wan.
44012018	Yu baiwan bara, suldawa nani tilara bin dauki aihka pali kan, witin nani sip tanka briras kan Pita ra dia takan sapa.
44012019	Herad mita pliki blikan wan, sakuna sip wal prawras kan. Bara suldawa nani ba lâka dauki muni, sut kat ikan. Ningkara, Herad Judia wina taki Sesaria ra wih iwan.
44012020	Herad lika ai kupia baiki kata, Tairus bara Saidon wal taunka ra iwi uplika nani mapara, kuna yu kum witin nani sut aidrubi balan witin ba mawanra. Sakuna witin nani lalah ni Herad suldawaka wihtka kumi wal uplika taki bangwan, baha nina ba Blastus kata. Bamna witin bak kupia kumi laka makaban, witin nani ai tasbaia ba king kuntrika wina ai pata brikan bamna.
44012021	Herad lika yu kum mangkan, baha yuara witin lika ai king kwalka diman ba kira king iwaika ra iwi, mahka sturi nani aisinka tara aisin.
44012022	Bamna upla nani ba ai bila baikra tara ni winan: "Naha aisi na lika upla apia, sakuna gâd pali kum aisisa!"
44012023	Baha sin pyua palira, Dawan insalka kumi mita munan Herad ba siknis takan, kan mayunra ba Gâd ra yaras kan bamna. Witin ai wîna tara ba liwa mita pin, bara ban pruan.
44012024	Sakuna Dawan sturka yamni ba lika kau ban tara pawi kata, ban plis nani sut ra sin smalkan kan.
44012025	Barnabas, Sâl wal ai warkka sut daukan bara, Jerusalem ra kli taui wan; witin nani ai kulma Jan bara nina wala Mark makan ba sin brihwan.
44013001	Antiok ra serts bara kan bara, dahra aisasara nani bara smasmalkra nani sin bara kan. Baha nani sika Barnabas, Simeon, nina wala Taya Siksa maki kan ba, Lusius Sairini wina ba, Manain witinka Galili kuntrika wihtka, Herad wal pawan ba, bara Sâl sin.
44013002	Yu kum naha uplika nani Gâd ra luki plun piras kira Dawan ra mayunan kan bara, Spirit Hulikira nan win: "Man nani Barnabas bara Sâl wal ba saki aik, baha warkka daukaia yang witin nani paiwri ba."
44013003	Bamna Gâd ra luki plun piras kira ai pura sunan ba ningkara, ai mihta nani witin nani pura ra kahbi, mahka blikan wan.
44013004	Barnabas Sâl wal ba Spirit Hulikira mita blikan bamna, witin nani Sailisia ra iwi wih, baha wina duri tara kum ra aimaki Saiprus ki dakura ra wan.
44013005	Witin nani Salamis ra wan bara, mahka Gâd sturka yamni ba smalki kan Ju nani sinagog watla ra. Jan Mark sin witin nani wal wan kata baha warkka ra help muni.
44013006	Baha ki dakura aiska ba impaki, witin nani ban Pepos ra balan. Bahara Ju waitna kum wal prawan ai nina Bar-Jisas, witin sukia warkka dauki kan. Witin lika kunin aisi win, dia witin aisi ba lika Gâd wina sa.
44013007	Witin lika baha ki dakura wihtka tara kan Serdius Polus; baha waitna ba sinskira kata. Bara wihta ba mita Barnabas, Sâl wal ra paiwan, witin Dawan bila walaia want kan bamna.
44013008	Sakuna baha sukia Grîk bilara Elimas maki kan ba mita baha wihtka bara wikan, Barnabas, Sâl wal mita dia smalkbia ba kasak lukaia apia.
44013009	Bamna Sâl, nina wala Pâl wi ba, Spirit Hulikira ni aibangwan, bara witin mita sukia ba kat aman kaiki,
44013010	nan win: --Man kuninki ra, saurakira, debil luhpia, diara pain nani sut waihlka sma ba. Diakan man Dawan yabalka wapni nani ba warbi lakaia munisma?
44013011	Bamna kais, nanara Dawan mita klala maikbia, bara man nakras kama, wan yu sin kaikma apia, pyua kum ba kat. Baha pali pyua Elimas nakra tihmia takan bara pliki kan upla kum pan ai mihta ra alki brihwabia kan blain takan bamna.
44013012	Bara wihta ba naha diara kaikan bara, kasak lukan, Dawan tanka smalkan ba dukyara sin ta iwan kan bamna.
44013013	Pâl ai uplika wala nani ba aikuki Pepos wina duri ra aimaki, ban laki Perga ra balan, Pampilia tasbaia ra; sakuna Jan, Mark lika witin nani wina dakwi taki kli Jerusalem ra wan.
44013014	Witin nani Perga wina Antiok taunka ra balan, baha ba Pisidia kuntrika wal lamara sa. Bahara witin nani wingka puhbaia yua ra sinagog ra dimi iwan.
44013015	Bamna Moses lâ ulban wauhkataya, bara dahra aisasara nani ulban wauhkataya nani ba aisi kaikan ningkara, prias watla wihtka nani ba mita naku maisapahkaia blikan: --Muihki nani, upla nani ra kupia kraukanka bila brisma kaka, sip sma nanara aisaia.
44013016	Bara Pâl buan, ai mihta ni sain munan sap takbia. Bara witin bila: --Israel waitnika nani bara man nani Gâd ra sibrin luki bangwisma ba, naha na wals.
44013017	Israel nisanka Gâdka ba wan damika nani ba bak saki brin, nisan tara daukaia, witin nani sin kau Idsipt tasbaia ra trengsar baku iwi kan bara. Baha ningkara, ai karnika ba ni baha tasbaia wina sakan.
44013018	Bamna Gâd witin nani ba mani 40 upla iwras tasbaia ra main kaiki bri tauki kan,
44013019	bara Kenan tasbaia ra 7 nisan iwi kan ba sut apu daukan, wan damika nani ra tasba ba yaia dukyara.
44013020	Baha takan 450 mani prais bilka ra. "Baha ningkara tâ bri nani ba wihta ra mangkan, Samyuil yua nani ba kat.
44013021	Baha ningkara witin nani king kum makaban, bara Gâd mita Kis luhpia Sâl ba king mangki yan mani 40 kat; witinka ba Bensiman kyamka kata.
44013022	Ningkara Gâd, Sâl ba sakisi, witin ai watlika ra Debit ba king mangkan. Gâd mita Debit tawan nan aisin: 'Jese luhpia waitna Debit sakri, ba yang pain kaikisna, bara sin ridi sa yang dia want sna ba sut daukbia.'
44013023	Naha sin Debit ra kyamka sika Jisas. Gâd witin ba bukan Israel uplika nani ba swaki sakaia, witin pramis aisin ba kat.
44013024	Jisas kau balras kan pyua ra, Jan Tatahbra mita Israel uplika nani ra smalki win: 'Man nani tahbi mai daukan kaia sa, bara saurkam nani ba sin sut swiaia sma.'
44013025	Jan Tatahbra ai warkka tnata ba alkaia man kan bara, naku aisin: 'Man nani yang na ya luki bangwisma ki? Yang lika baha man nani bila kaikisma ba apia sna. Kuna yang nini ra wala kum aula, yang witin mina ra suska awa pan sip langkras sna.'
44013026	"Muihki nani, Ebraham kyamka nani sma ba, bara Ju apia nani Gâd ra sibrin luki bangwisma ba sin: man nani sut dukyam sa naha swaki sakan laka sturka na.
44013027	Bamna baha nani Jerusalem ra iwi kan ba, ai wihtka nani sut aikuki Jisas ba ya sapa tanka briras kan, bara dahra aisasara nani wauhkataya wina wingka puhbaia yua bani sinagog aisi kaiki bangwi kan ba sin tanka briras kan. Baku mika Jisas pât ra lulki bangwan bara, dahra aisasara nani dia aisin ba tnata alkan.
44013028	Witin ba ikaia pâtka diara kumi sin sakras kan, sakuna witin nani ban Pailat ra makaban witin ba ikaia.
44013029	Bara Ulbanka nani witin dukyara dia aisin ba sut daukan bara, witin ba dus prihni wina alahbi si raiti ra bikan kan.
44013030	Sakuna Gâd witin ba pruan nani tila wina kli bukan.
44013031	Ningkara, yu ailal Jisas latan takan, witin wal Galili wina Jerusalem ra wan nani ra, bara nanara baha nani sika witin dukyara upla nani ra witnis aisi ba.
44013032	"Baku bamna, yang nani nara sna baha sturka yamni ba man nani ra mai wiaia, Gâd dia wan damika nani ra pramis munan ba.
44013033	Baha nani kyamka bangwisna bamna, yang nani ra Gâd ai pramiska dia aisin ba kat daukan, witin Jisas pruan wina bukan bara, Pura Sunra Lawana wauhkataya 2 ra ulban ba baku: 'Man ba yang Luhpi waitna sma; naiwa raya kaia laka ba maikri sa.'
44013034	Bamna naha dukyara sika Gâd aisin kan ba, witinka ba pruan nani tila wina bukbia, wîna tara ba swika sukwi sin luan kabia apia, Ulbankara aisi ba baku: 'Yamnika nani Debit ra yaia pramis munri ba, man nani ra maikamna.'
44013035	Baha mihta kli Pura Sunra Lawana Nani Ulbanka wala ra sin naku wisa: 'Man nampakan waitna wîna swirka sukwi lubia apia.'
44013036	Debit ai yua nani ra Gâd dukya daukan, dia witin ra win ba kat. Ningkara, witin pruan bara, ai aisika nani raitika lamara brisi bikan, bara ai wîna tara ban sukwi luan.
44013037	Sakuna witinka Gâd mita pruan wina bukan ba wîna tara ba, sukwi luras kan.
44013038	Muihki nani, man nani sut pain kaikaia sma, wan saurka nani swih tikaia laka ba lika Jisas bak mai wisa.
44013039	Witin ra kasak luki nani ba bani saurka nani sut ba swih tikan sa, Moses lakara sip swih tikras kan ba.
44013040	Bamna aman kais, dahra aisasara nani dia ulban ba sut man nani puramra kauhbiara. Witin nani naku aisin:
44013041	'Man nani, lawaska kakikra nani sma ba, kais, ta iwan taki si mahka prui bangws; man nani yuam ra baha sat dukya nani daukamna ba sip kasak luki bangwma apia, upla kasak mita mai smalkbia sin.' "
44013042	Pâl ai uplika nani aikuki Ju nani sinagog wina takan bara, Ju apia nani mita win, wingka puhbaia yua wala kli bal baha sturka yamni ba witin nani ra kli smalkbia.
44013043	Sinagog ra asla takan ba tnata alkan, Ju ailal, bara Ju takan uplika ailal sin, Pâl Barnabas wal nina blikan. Bara apastil nani mita smalki kupia kraukan, nahki witin nani ban kasak kaia sa Gâd latwanka laka ra.
44013044	Wîk wala ra, wingka puhbaia yua, taun aiska ba aidruban kan Dawan bila walaia.
44013045	Sakuna Ju nani kaikan nahki upla ailal aidruban kan ba, bara mahka tumi bangwan, Pâl mapara sin aisi, saura sin win.
44013046	Bamna Pâl bara Barnabas wal lika sibrin apu aisi win: --Aitani pali kan Gâd bila na man nani ra pas mai smalkaia. Sakuna man nani mita alki briras, raya ban kaia laka ba sin brin mai daukras sa kaka, yang nani lika Ju apia uplika nani ra mahka auna.
44013047	Naku sika Dawan ai laka yang nani ra wan smalki wan win ba: 'Man ba Ju apia nani ingnika wisi mai mangkri, bara naha tasba aiska ba swaki sakaia yabalka ra sin mai mangkri.'
44013048	Ju apia nani ba naha walan bara, lilia pali takan, bara mahka aisin Dawan bila ba pain pali sa. Bara baha nani sut raya ban kaia laka briaia kan nani ba, kasak lukan.
44013049	Bara baku Dawan bila smalkan kan baha tasbaia aiskara.
44013050	Bara Ju nani mita baha taunka ra ta bri waitnika nani ra, bara tara kulkan mairka nani ba sut wal aisin. Bara witin nani sut buan Pâl, Barnabas wal mapara rausauhkaia, bara kuntri ba wina sin kangbaia.
44013051	Bamna apastil nani mita ai mina ra tasba yuya nani alkan ba syauhbi sakan, baha uplika nani mapara witnis kaia ba dukyara. Ningkara witin nani Aikonium ra wan.
44013052	Sakuna lalukra nani Antiok ra bangwi kan ba lilia pali kan, Spirit Hulikira ni sin aibangwan kan.
44014001	Aikonium ra, Pâl Barnabas wal Ju nani prias watla ra dimi, ai natka kan ba baku witin nani mahka upla smalkan, bara upla uya kasak lukan, Ju nani bara Ju apia nani sin.
44014002	Sakuna tila Ju nani kasak lukras kan ba mita, Ju apia nani ra maisapahkan, wan muihni nani mapara saura lukaia.
44014003	Apastil nani ba bahara pyua wihka takaskan, bara ai kupia aiska ni sibrin apu Dawan dukyara aisi kan. Gâd latwanka laka dukyara aisi kan bamna, Dawan mita kau tabaiki karnika sin yan, sain nani, wark aihka nani sin daukaia.
44014004	Bara taun uplika nani ba dakni walra takan, kumi ba Ju nani helpka taki kan, bara wala ba lika apastil nani helpka.
44014005	Ju nani bara Ju apia nani ba wihta nani aikuki lâ daukan, apastil nani ra rau sauhkaia bara walpa ni sin sabaia.
44014006	Sakuna Pâl Barnabas, wal baha kaikan bara, witin nani plapan Laikonia tasbaia ra, Listra ra, Derbe ra, ban baha taunka nani kir,
44014007	bahara sin swaki sakan laka sturka ba smalki kan.
44014008	Listra ra waitna kum kan sip wapras. Witin aisubi takan ba wina ai kuhma ba skahwa kan bamna, ban bahara iwi kan.
44014009	Bara naha waitna lika Pâl dia aisi kan ba kat aman pali wali kan. Bara Pâl waitnika ba kat taui kaikan bara, ai dara walan nahki naha waitna kasak luki kan witin ba rawbia.
44014010	Bara ai bila baikra karna wini, win: --Man minam ra wapni bus! Bara waitnika kata ba pâli tit bui, mahka wapan.
44014011	Upla nani bara bangwi kan ba kaikan dia Pâl daukan ba, bara witin nani sut ai bila baikra karna wini aisin Laikonia nani bilara: --Gâd nani upla baku taki wan tilara bal iwan sa!
44014012	Witin nani mita Barnabas nina ba Seus win, Pâl ba Hermis win, kan witin sika kau aisi kan bamna.
44014013	Bara Seus prîstka ba, ai tempelka taun ra dimaika kat bri kan ba, bui bip nani, tangni nani diara skahkaia dukya pain nani sut bri balan. Bara upla nani bara bangwi kan ba sin aikuki asla takan, bip nani iki sakripais baku dauki apastil nani ra mayunaia wisi.
44014014	Sakuna Pâl, Barnabas wal baha sturka walan bara, ai kwalka nani kalki ban upla nani ba tilara dimi, ai bila baikra karna winan:
44014015	--Upliki nani, diakan man nani naku dauki bangwisma ki? Yang nani na sin man nani wal baku upla sna. Sakuna nara yang nani balri na, man nani ra sturi yamni ba mai smalkaia, naha diara bahki nani na swisi Gâd rayakira ba nina blikma, witinka mita kasbrika pura, tasba, kabu, nani ra dia, dia baha nani bilara ba sut paskan bamna.
44014016	Pyua luan nani ra Gâd mita ban swin upla nani sut ba ai yabalka kat man tauki kaia.
44014017	Pyua bani witin ba ya sapa tanka marikan, diara yamni dauki ba bak: li kasbrika purara ba wina wankisa, insla ra plun yan pawisa, witin plun aitani wankisa yawan pih lilia kabia dukyara.
44014018	Apastil nani naha diara nani sut aisin sakuna, ban karna kan upla nani bip nani iki witin nani ra mayuni sakripais dauki yaban daukan ba takaskaia.
44014019	Bara tila Ju nani aidrubi balan Antiok wina, Aikonium wina sin. Witin nani upla nani ra maisakapi muni, Pâl ra walpa ni saban. Witin nani luki bangwan Pâl ba pruan kan, bamna taun ba wina raski sakan.
44014020	Sakuna kristian nani sut aidrubi bal pat tnaya kir bui bangwan, bara witin ba kli rawan. Ningkara taun ra kli dimi wan; bara yu walara Barnabas wal Derbe ra wan.
44014021	Pâl Barnabas wal Derbe ra swaki sakan laka sturka yamni ba smalkan, bara kristian kau manas takan. Ningkara witin nani kli Listra ra, Aikonium ra, Antiok ra sin wan.
44014022	Baha pliska nani ra kristian nani sutra tabaikan, ban sin smalki kupia kraukan kasak lukan lakara bapi bui kabia, bara sin win Gâd king aimaki tasbaia ra dimaia kaka, pât nani wauhwaia sa.
44014023	Bamna serts nani banira ta uplika nani mangkan. Baha ningkara, Gâd ra luki plun piras kira ai pura suni, baha ba Dawan mihta ra mangkan, witin nani sut witinka ra kasak luki kan ba.
44014024	Ningkara witin nani Pisidia kuntrika bak impaki, Pampilia tasbaia ra balan.
44014025	Sturi yamni ba Perga taunka ra sin smalkan. Ningkara witin nani Atalia ra balan.
44014026	Bahara witin nani duri tara kum ra aimaki Antiok ra balan. Baha pliska ra sika serts ta upla nani mita witin nani ba Gâd latwanka mihta ra mangkan, bara nanara witin nani baha daukaia kata sut dauki tnata alkan kan.
44014027	Witin nani Antiok ra balan bara, serts uplika nani sut asla paiwan, bara baha nani ra win, dia, dia Dawan witin nani ra daukan ba, bara nahki Gâd mita Ju apia nani ra sin yabalka ba sakan kasak lukaia dukyara.
44014028	Bara Pâl Barnabas wal bahara pyua wihka takaskan kristian nani ba aikuki.
44015001	Baha pyua ra tila upla nani Judia wina Antiok ra balan. Baha nani mita wan muihni nani ra naku smalkan: swaki sakan laka ba briaia kaka, sirkumsisan ba ai wîna ra briaia, Moses lâ yan ba kat.
44015002	Naha diara na dukyara, Pâl Barnabas wal baha uplika nani aikuki kasak blahwan. Ningkara, Pâl bara Barnabas, bara upla tila nani sin sakan Jerusalem ra waia, apastil nani bara serts ta uplika nani aikuki, naha tanka na dukyara aisi kaikaia.
44015003	Antiok serts ka uplika nani mita witin nani ba blikan, bara ai impakanka ba brin. Bara ban Pinisia bara Sameria tasbaia nani bak maisapahki wan, nahki Ju apia nani ai lukanka almuk nani ba lulki si, Dawan nina blikan ba tanka. Wan muihni nani naha sturka walan bara uya lilia pali takan.
44015004	Pâl, Barnabas wal Jerusalem ra balan bara, serts ba, bui baku sin apastil nani ba mita, bara ta uplika nani ba mita sut sin pain brin. Baha nani ra sin witin nani mita maisapahkan dia, dia Dawan witin nani wal daukan ba.
44015005	Parisi daknika wina, tila nani kasak luki bangwan nani ba, ai mina ra bui, nan aisin: --Ju apia nani kasak luki bangwi ba sut, ai wîna ra sirkumsisan ba briaia sa, Moses la nani wankan ba sin kulkaia sa.
44015006	Apastil nani bara serts ta uplika nani aikuki asla taki bangwan, baha laka ba dukyara tanka plikaia.
44015007	Pana, pana kasak aisi blahwan ningkara, Pita buan, bara nan aisin: --Muihni nani, man nani pain kaikisma, nahki Gâd mita man nani tilam wina bak ai saki ai brin, Ju apia nani ra sin swaki sakan laka sturka ba smalkaia, baha nani sin kasak lukbia dukyara.
44015008	Bara Gâd, witinka upla kupia pain kaiki ba bui naha diara na wan marikan sa, nahki Ju apia nani ra sin want ba, bara Spirit Hulikira baha nani ra yaban sin yawan ra wankan ba baku.
44015009	Gâd mita yawan na Ju apia nani ba wal kau sat aihka lika wan kulkras sa, kan witin nani ai kasak lukan laka ba mita ai kupia nani sin klin sakan sa.
44015010	Bara nanara, diakan man nani Gâd diara daukan ba mapara aihka lukisma, ban naha lalukra nani ra yarka karban wihra twilkaia munisma, baha karbanka yawan bara wan damika nani sin sip twilkras kan ba?
44015011	Sip apia pali. Kan yawan nani kasak lukisa, swaki wan sakan laka bri na lika, Dawan Jisas kupia latwanka ba mita, bara baku sin Ju apia nani ba mapara sin.
44015012	Bamna upla nani ba sut sap taki wali kan, bara Pâl, Barnabas wal ai sturka ba mahka aisin, nahki Gâd witin nani bak sain nani, wark aihka nani sin daukan ba Ju apia nani tilara.
44015013	Baha nani aisi tnata alkan bara, Jems naku aisin: --Muihki nani, pliskam yang ra wira wals:
44015014	Saiman Pita pat wan win, nahki Gâd Ju apia nani ra pas pali pain yamnika yan ba, bara witin nani tila wina sin bak saki brin ai uplika nani kaia.
44015015	Baha diara nani na lika dahra aisasara nani bila aisinka ba kat aimakisa, Ulbanka nani ra naku aisi ba baku:
44015016	'Naha diara nani ningkara, yang Debit watla kauhwan ba bal kli buki bapamna; sauhkan ba sin kli paskamni, kli sin raya bapamni.
44015017	Upla wala nani sut Dawan plikbia ba mata, bara nisan wala nani sut pura ra yang nini makan sin.
44015018	Dawan naku wisa, witinka naha diara nani ban patitara pyua ba wina swin ba kaikan.'
44015019	"Baha mita yang lukanki ba lika naku sa: yawan Ju apia nani ra trabil munaia apia sa, witin nani ai lukanka almuk ba swisi, Dawan nina blikuya kaka aitani sa.
44015020	Aitani kabia yawan baha nani ra ulbi maisapahkaia, aidul ra sakripais daukan pata satka kumi sin pibia apia, baha taski bamna. Bara upla kumi marit takras kira ai maîa briaia apia sa, daîwan katwi pruan nani wina ba pibia apia, talia sin apia.
44015021	Bamna patitara pyua ba wina taun banira upla bara sa, Moses laka ba dukyara smalkisa, bara wingka puhbaia yua banira sin prias watla nani ra aisi kaikisa.
44015022	Bamna apastil nani bara ta uplika nani, bara serts aiska ba wilin takan, witin nani ai tila wina upla tila nani saki Antiok kat blikaia, Pâl bara Barnabas aikuki. Witin nani sakan ba lika Judas, nina wala Barnabas maki ba, wala Sailas, witinka waitna pain aihwa kulkan ba wan muihni nani tilara.
44015023	Bara witin nani baha nani wal wauhkataya kum blikan bahara naku ulban kan: "Yang nani apastil bara serts ta uplika nani, bara wan muihni nani sut ba mita, Ju apia nani sma bara lakula mai blikisna, muihni nani lakara, man nani sut Antiok ra iwisma ba, Siria ra, Sailisia tasbaia ra sin.
44015024	Yang nani tanka briri tila upla nani adar yaras katna ba, naha wina taki man nani ra wan; bara witin nani man nani ra aisi ba mita ambuk mai muni mamwahkan.
44015025	Baha mita yang nani aitani luki bangwri, yang nani tili na wina upla nani saki blikaia, man nani mai kaikaia, bamna wan muihni latwankira nani, Pâl bara Barnabas wal baha nani ba blikuna.
44015026	Witin wal sika ai rayaka ba trabil ra ban dingkan wan Dawan Jisas Kraist tawan.
44015027	Baku bara, yang nani blikuna ba sika Judas bara Sailas wal, witin nani mita man nani pali wînam kat, kat aisi mai wibia, dia, dia yang nani ulbri ya ba tanka sut.
44015028	Bamna Spirit Huliki ra aitani lukan bara yang nani sin, man nani puram ra wihrika wala sunaia apia, naha kupia kraukanka nani na baman lika:
44015029	daîwan wîna aidul nani ra sakripais daukan ba lika pipara, talya ba sin apia, daîwan nani langki ikan wîna ba sin apia, bara upla kumi marit takras kaka ai maîa ba briaia apia sa. Naha diara nani alki brima kaka, man nani pain daukisma. Bara yamni wama."
44015030	Baku bara, baha nani blikan ba ban Antiok ra wan. Bahara lalukra nani ba sut aikuki asla takan bara, wauhkataya ba baha nani mihta ra mangkan.
44015031	Wan muihni nani baha aisi kaikan bara, lilia pali taki bangwan, baha maisanihkra witin nani ra yabi ba dukyara.
44015032	Judas bara Sailas wal sin sip pali kan Dawan wina kupia kraukanka pain brin ba baha nani ra yaia, bamna ai bila nani aisi wan muihni nani ra maisanihkan, kupia sin uya ta baikan.
44015033	Witin nani pyua tila nani bahara luan ningkara, wan muihni nani mita kupia kumi laka ra lakula dauki muni, blikan nani mihta ra kli blikan wan.
44015034	[Sakuna Sailas lika wilin takan bahara takaskaia.]
44015035	Pâl bara Barnabas wal sin Antiok ra ban takaskan. Upla wala nani aikuki, witin nani mita upla nani ra Dawan sturka yamni ba smalki, kupia krauki kan.
44015036	Baha yua nani ningkara, Pâl Barnabas ra win: --Kaisa kli wan muihni nani ba nahki sapa kaikaia, baha pliska nani sutra yawan Dawan sturka smalkan nani ra.
44015037	Bara Barnabas lika want kan Jan, Mark ba kli witin nani tilara brih taukaia.
44015038	Sakuna Pâl mita baha wahma kli aikuki taukaia aitani lukras kan, witin kata sika Pampilia kuntrika ra witin nani ra swin; bara wark ra waras kan.
44015039	Baha dukyara witin nani uya blahwan, ningkara wal dakwi takan; bara Barnabas mita Jan, Mark ba brih duri tara aimakan, Saiprus ra waia.
44015040	Pâl lika Sailas ba bak saki brin. Wan muihni nani mita witin nani ba Dawan latwanka laka mihta ra mangkan, ningkara witin nani mahka impakan.
44015041	Witin nani Siria bara Sailisia bak lui wan kristian nani bara ba tabaiki.
44016001	Pâl bara Sailas wal impaki witin nani Derbe ra wan, baha wina Listra ra balan. Bahara sika lalukra kum wal prawan nina ba sika Timoti; witin ba Ju lalukra mairin kum luhpia, ai aisika lika Grîk kata.
44016002	Wan muihni nani Listra ra bara Aikonium ra iwi kan ba sut mita, witin dukya ra diara pain man aisi kan.
44016003	Pâl brin daukan Timoti ba witin wal taukbia, bamna witin ba brisi sirkumsisan daukan, Ju nani baha kuntrika ra iwi kan ba kupia sauhkaia apia ba mata. Kan upla nani sut pat kaikan, witin aisika ba Grîk kan ba.
44016004	Bara taun bani witin nani luan ba, wan muihni nani sut mihta ra mangkan, apastil nani bara ta uplika nani Jerusalem ra bara bangwi ba mita, dia witin nani ai mihta ra lâ mangkan ba.
44016005	Bamna serts nani ba kau bapi buan kasak lukan lakara, bara kristian nani lika pyua bani ailal taki kata.
44016006	Spirit Hulikira adar yaras kata Esia ra sturi yamni ba smalkaia. Bamna witin nani Pridsia bara Galesha tasbaika bak impaki,
44016007	ban Misia tasbaia lainka kat balan. Baha wina Bitinia tasbaia ra luaia lukan, sakuna Jisas Spiritka mita bahara waia adar yaras kan.
44016008	Bamna witin nani Misia ba laihku lui, Troas ra iwi wan.
44016009	Bahara Pâl tihmia ra diara aihka latan kaikan. Masedonia waitnika kumi ai mina ra bui witin ra makabi win: "Masedonia ra lui bal, help wan muns."
44016010	Pâl naha diara aihka kaikan bara, yang nani mahka ridi taki bangwri Masedonia ra waia. Bamna lukri baha ba kasak pali Dawan mita paiwi kan, Masedonia ra wih Dawan sturka yamni ba yang nani smalkaia.
44016011	Bamna yang nani Troas wina duri tara aimaki, ban impaki Samotresia ra bal bangwri, yu wala lika Niapolis ra.
44016012	Baha wina yang nani Pilipai ra wari; naha taunka ra lika Rom uplika pali nani iwi kan ba, Masedonia tilara taun kau tara kulkan kan ba. Bahara yang nani pyua wiria takaski bangwri.
44016013	Wingka puhbaia yua kum ra, yang nani taun ba wina lata tanira taki wari, awala un ra. Upla nani ai natka kan, bahara wih ai pura sunaia. Bamna yang nani mahka iwi, mairin nani bahara bal asla takan nani ra Dawan sturka yamni ba smalki bangwri.
44016014	Witin nani wina kumi ba nina Lidia, Taiataira taunka wina, kwala painkira mapla balyante wauhwi aiâtkra kan. Mairka ba Gâd ra mayuni kan, bara witin sin bara wali kata; Dawan mita ai kupia ba ilingkan, Pâl dia aisi ba aman pali walaia.
44016015	Witin lika ai watla uplika nani sut ba wal tahbi daukan. Ningkara yang nani ra makaban: --Yang na kasak Dawan ra tauri lukisma kaka, man nani bal waitla ra dimi takas. Bamna witin taibi ai munan takaskaia.
44016016	Yu kumi yang nani pura sunaia pliska ra taki auna kan bara, tukta mairin kum wal prawi bangwri; witin sukia, diara kaikaia spiritka bri kata. Witin alba kan, bara diara kaikaia warkka dauki ba wina ai dawanka nani ba lalah uya pali sakaia yabi kan.
44016017	Naha tuktan mairin na mahka Pâl bara yang nani nini ra wapi wini, ban aisi win: --Naha waitna nani na lika Gâd lai purara iwi ba dukya dadaukra nani sa, man nani ra sin maisampahkisa swaki sakan yabalka ba dukyara!
44016018	Yu ailal baku dauki kan. Ban pyua kum kat Pâl kupia sauhkan, bara taui baha spiritka saura tukta mairin ra kan bara win: --Jisas Kraist nina ra yang mai wisna, man witin ba wina taks. Bara baha minitkara spirit saura witin ba swin.
44016019	Sakuna tukta mairin dawanka nani kaikan, nanara witin nani sip kli witin bak lalah sakbia apia, bamna Pâl bara Sailas wal ra alki lilia dauki taukaia pliska ra brisi, wihta nani mihta ra mangkan.
44016020	Witin nani mita Pâl Sailas wal ba Rom wihtka nani mawanra brisi, nan aisin: --Naha waitnika nani Ju nani sa, bara wan taunka ra bal trabil bukisa.
44016021	Witin nani wan smalki ba natka yawan sip alki daukbia apia, kan Rom uplika nani sna.
44016022	Bara upla nani sut witin nani mapara buan, wihtka nani mita sin adar yan kwalka nani ba taya wina daiki si, klala ni wipbia.
44016023	Witin nani ra uya wipan ba ningkara, silak ra mangkan, bara silak watla main kakaira sin adar yan, pain pali aihwaki bri kabia.
44016024	Silak watla main kakaira baha adarka brin bara, Pâl bara Sailas wal ba silak watla bila un pali tani kat brisi, mina nani sut dus unta daukan bara dingki priskan.
44016025	Sakuna tihmia wal bakrikira, Pâl bara Sailas wal ai pura suni Gâd ra lawan aiwani kan, bamna upla nani silak ra kan ba witin nani ra wali kan.
44016026	Tisku baku kan, tasba nikban, bara silak watla playka nani ba sut sin nikban kata. Baha sin pyua ra silak watla durka nani sut ba kwawan, bara silak ra mangkan uplika nani ba sut wilkan nani kan ba langwi kauhwan.
44016027	Silak watla main kakaira ba yapan wina kupia krauan buan bara, kaikan silak watla durka nani sut lika param man kan. Bara ai sordka saki ai mihta pruaia luki kan, witin lukan silak ra mangkan uplika nani sut ba taki plapan.
44016028	Sakuna Pâl aitabaiki winan: --Man wînam ra wataui munpara, kan yang nani sut nara sna!
44016029	Bara silak watla main kakaira ba lamp kum makabi, witin ban plapi diman, sibrin mita ai wîna sut tatatwi kan, bara Pâl, Sailas wal mina kat kauhwan.
44016030	Ningkara, Pâl bara Sailas wal ba silak wina saki, makabi walan: --Masa nani, yang dia daukamna bara ai swaki ai sakan kabia ki?
44016031	Witin nani bila: --Dawan Jisas Kraist ra kasak luks, man bara wamtla uplika nani sut.
44016032	Witin nani mita Dawan sturka yamni ba witin ra smalkan, bara watla uplika nani sut ra sin.
44016033	Baha sin tihmika silak watla main kakaira ba mita witin nani ba brisi insauhkanka nani ba sikban; bara witin ba tahbi daukan, watla uplika nani sin sut.
44016034	Ningkara, witin nani ba ai watla ra brisi plun dakakan. Bara witin ai watla uplika sut aikuki lilia pali kan, nahki witin nani Dawan ra kasak lukaia laka alkan ba dukyara.
44016035	Titan ra wihta nani mita suldawa nani blikan, silak watla main kakaira ra maisapahkbia Pâl bara Sailas wal ba langkaia.
44016036	Bara silak watla main kakaira ba Pâl ra win: --Wihta nani wina adar aikan sa man nani mai langkamna, bamna nanara man nani sip sma liliakira mahka taki waia.
44016037	Sakuna Pâl mita suldawa nani ra win: --Yang nani na Rom taunka suliarka nani sna, bara laika sin daukras kira upla sut mawanra ai wipi silak ra sin ai mangkan, bara nanara yukuwi pali ai saki bangwaisa? Sip apia! Witin nani pali bal naha wina ai sakaia sa.
44016038	Aihwawakra nani mita baha tanka nani ba sut wihta nani ra win. Wihta nani sibrin takan, baha nani ba Rom taunka suliarka nani sa walan bara.
44016039	Wihta nani wan, bara Pâl bara Sailas wal ra makaban ai pâtka nani ba swih tikbia, bara saki muni ban sin makaban taun ba wina mahka taki wabia.
44016040	Witin nani silak wina takan, bara Lidia watla ra wih diman. Ningkara, wan muihni nani ba kaikan, bara baha nani ra tabaiki muni, baha wina mahka wan.
44017001	Pâl bara Sailas wal impaki Ampipolis bara Apolonia bak Tesalonaika taunka ra balan. Bahara lika Ju nani priaska watla kum bara kan.
44017002	Pâl ai natka kan ba baku, witin prias watla ra wih diman. Wîk yuhmpa bahara takaskan bara wingka puhbaia yua bani baha uplika nani wal aisi kan.
44017003	Ulbanka nani tanka ba param aisi kan, Mesaia ba pat wauhwaia kan, witin pruan ka wina kli buaia kan ba sin. Bara sin win: --Naha Jisaska dukyara aisisna na sika Mesaia ba.
44017004	Bamna tila Ju nani kasak lukan, bara Pâl bara Sailas aikuki asla takan, Grîk uplika nani ailal Gâd ra kasak luki nani kan ba sin, bara tara kulkan mairka nani sin uya.
44017005	Sakuna Ju nani kasak lukras kan ba mita ai kupia baikan, bara waitna saura nani bahki man yabal ra kirbi tauki nani ba, asla paiwi, upla nani kupia turban. Witin nani mita Jeson watla ra pliki wan, Pâl bara Sailas wal bara kaka, saki upla nani mihta ra mangkaia.
44017006	Witin nani bahara sakras kan bamna, Jeson bara wan muihni tila nani alki raski, taun wihtka nani mawanra brisi muni, bara aitabaiki winan: --Naha waitnika nani mita sika tasba aiska na ma kupi sa, ban naha kat sin balan,
44017007	bara Jeson ai watla ra dingki brisa. Naha nani Rom kingka Sisar laka mapara bui sa. Witin nani sin wisa king wala kumi bara sa, baha ba Jisas.
44017008	Upla nani bara wihta nani kyama ra naha diara nani diman bara, baha nani sut kupia turban pali takan.
44017009	Bamna taun wihtka nani mita win, Jeson bara wan muihni nani sut lalah aibapbia. Bamna witin nani lalah aibapi, pri takan.
44017010	Tihmia pat iwan, wan muihni nani mita Pâl bara Sailas wal Beria ra blikan wan. Witin nani nan Beria ra diman bara, Ju nani priaska watla ra, wih diman.
44017011	Naha Ju ka nani na kau upla painkira nani kan Tesalonaika nani ba wal. Witin nani ai kupia aiska ni Dawan bila ba brih kan, bara yu bani Ulbanka nani ba tanka pliki kaiki kan, diara nani aisi kan ba kasak sapa.
44017012	Baha nani ailal kasak luki bangwan, Grîk mairka tara kulkan nani ba sin ailal, bara Grîk waitna nani sin uya kasak lukan.
44017013	Sakuna Tesalonaika ra Ju nani bara bangwi kan ba walan, nahki Pâl Dawan bila ba Beria ra sin wih smalkisa, bamna bahara sin witin nani wih upla nani kupia turban.
44017014	Wan muihni nani mita aihni pali Pâl ba kabu un ra blikan wan. Sailas bara Timoti wal lika Beria ra takaskan.
44017015	Baha nani Pâl yula kahbi auya kan ba, ban Atens taunka kat wan. Witin nani mahka kli ai bila tauan bara. Pâl mita win Timoti bara Sailas wal ra wibia aihni trai kaiki witin ra balbia.
44017016	Pâl ba Atens ra, Sailas bara Timoti wal bila kaiki kan bara, witin ai kupia ba sap apia kan, baha taunka ba aidul laka ni bangwan kan kaikan bamna.
44017017	Baha mita witin mita prias watla Ju nani ra, bara Gâd ra luki mayuni uplika nani ra sin aisi kan. Ban pulaia pliska ra sin upla nani wal prawi ba banira aisi kan.
44017018	Upla nani kum, kum Epikyuriyan smalkanka stadi muni kan ba, bara wala nani Stoik smalkanka stadi muni kan ba sut witin wal mahka blahwan. Tila nani bila: --Naha waitnika sturi aisasara pali na, dia sip saki wan wiaia? Wala nani bila: --Gâd wala nani smasmalkrika talya sa. Witin nani naku aisi kan, kan Pâl lika aisi kan Jisas dukyara, witinka pruan wina kli buan ba dukyara sin.
44017019	Bamna Pâl ba Areopagus ilka ra brihwan. Pyua bani baha pliska ra sika witin nani asla taki kan, dia, dia kra aisaia brikan kaka. Bara baha uplika nani mita makabi walan: --Sip sna ki yang nani kaikaia baha smalkanka raya man bri balram ba?
44017020	Diara aihka pali nani wan wisma bamna, yang nani want sna kaikaia naha tanka na dia sa sapa.
44017021	Atens uplika nani, bara trengsar nani bahara iwi ba sut diara bahki nani ra ai pyua nani tikras kan, sakuna diara raya kum kaka lika walaia laik kan, aisaia sin.
44017022	Bamna Areopagus ilka ra, Pâl baha nani lilapas kat ai mina ra bui, win: "Atens waitnika nani, yang kaikisni man nani ba gâd nani ba kakulkra pali sma.
44017023	Kan yang naha taunka ra wapi tauki kapri, man nani puram sunisma ba pliska nani ra sin, bara altar kum kaikri; bahara bila nani ulban kan ba lika nan kata: 'Gâd kum ra kaikras ba.' Bamna pain sa, baha Gâdka man nani kaikras kuna puram suni mayunisma ba, baha pali Gâdka dukyara sika yang aisisna ba.
44017024	"Gâd, witinka mita naha tasba, dia, dia sin bilara ba sut paskan ba, witin sika kasbrika purara bara tasba sut Dawanka sa. Upla ai mihta ni paskan tempelka ra sin dimi iwras sa.
44017025	Upla kum mita ai dukia daukaia sin witin nit apia sa. Kau witin mita ni upla sut ra rayaka yabisa, pasa, diara wala nani sin sut.
44017026	"Witin upla kumi wina, nisan satka bani ba paskan, tasba aiskara iwaia. Witin mita sin pyua nani, plis nani sin mangki yan anira iwaia kaia ba.
44017027	Naha sut witin daukan, upla nani baha kaiki witin ra plikaia, bara ban kra wal prawbia Gâd ba yawan wina laiura apia sa baman.
44017028	Kan witin taka mita sika yawan raya sa, aiauisa, nara sin bangwisa. Man nani tilam wina sinskira aisasara tila nani naku aisin: 'Yang nani na sin Gâd taiyka sna.'
44017029	Gâd taiyka nani sa kaka, diakan yawan lukaia Gâd ba lalah pauni, lalah pihni kra, walpa ni upla ai mihta ai ni paskan lilka baku kulkaia?
44017030	Gâd lika patitara pyua ra upla nani diara tanka kaikras kan ba mapara ai nakra prakan kan. Sakuna naiwa yua ra lika plis banira upla nani iwi ba sutra param wisa, ai saurka nani ba wina ai kupia lakaia sa.
44017031	Gâd yu kumi mangkan sa, naha tasba aiska na laka wapni kat daukaia, waitna kumi witin bak sakan ba mita. Naha dukyara tanka aiska wan marikan sa, Jisas pruan wina bukan bamna."
44017032	Pruan nani kli buaia dukyara aisin walan bara, tila nani mita lawaska kikan. Wala nani bila: --Kau pain kabia pyua walara kli naha aisanka na walaia.
44017033	Bara Pâl witin nani tila wina mahka taki wan.
44017034	Sakuna upla kum, kum ai nina blikan, kasak sin lukan. Witin nani tilara kata Daionisius, witinka Areopagus uplika kum, bara mairin kumi nina Damaris, bara kau wala nani sin.
44018001	Naha diara ningkara, Pâl Atens wina taki Korint taunka ra wan.
44018002	Bahara witin Ju waitna kum wal prawan, ai nina Akwila kata; witin ba Pontus tasbaia ra aisubi takan. Akwila lika ai maîa wal bisi pali Itali kuntrika wina balan kan, kan king Klandius mita Ju nani sut Rom taunka wina kangbi sakan kan bamna, witin mani sin baha wina takan. Bara Pâl wan witin nani ba kaikaia.
44018003	Witin baha nani wal takaskan kan sin warkka dadaukra nani kan, tent watla papaskra kata; bamna witin nani wal takaskan aikuki wark takaia.
44018004	Wingka puhbaia yua bani Pâl lika Ju nani prias watla ra wan; bahara witin trai kaiki kan Ju nani, Grîk uplika nani sin kupia alkaia.
44018005	Sailas bara Timoti wal Masedonia wina balan bara, Pâl lika ai pyua aiska pali yaban, param pali Ju nani ra wiaia sturi yamni ba tanka, Jisas ba Mesaia sa.
44018006	Sakuna witin nani mahka pali bui, witin mapara swira bila nani aisin. Bara Pâl ai kwalka singbi sain kum yan, nahki witin nani tila wina taki auya ba, bara sin win: --Man nani tanis tiwma kaka, baha lika man nani pali pâtkam sa, yang laila purara baha pâtka apu sa. Bamna naiwa na wina yang Ju apia nani tilara auna.
44018007	Witin sinagog wina taki waitna kumi watla ra wan, waitnika nina ba Taitus Justus kata. Witin ba Gâd ra ai pura suni mayuni kan, ai watla ba bri kan sinagog tnaya ra.
44018008	Bara Krispus, prias watla wihtka ba, ai watla uplika sut aikuki Dawan ra kasak lukan. Korint uplika nani ailal pali sin Dawan sturka walan, bara kasak lukan ba sut tahbi daukan.
44018009	Bamna Dawan mita Pâl ra tihmia ra diara aihka kaikan bak naku win: "Man sîbripara; kau aisi smalki bas, bilam prakpara.
44018010	Yang man wal sna, bamna upla kumi sin mai alki sip rau mai sauhkbia apia, naha taunka ra yang upla ailal pali brisna bamna."
44018011	Baku bara Pâl mita Korint ra mani kumi pura bakriki takaskan; baha nani ra Gâd sturka smalki kan.
44018012	Sakuna baha yua nani ra, Galio ba Akeya wihtka tara aimaki kan pyua, Ju nani sut asla taki Pâl mapara buan, bara la watla ra brisi,
44018013	wihta ra win: --Naha waitnika mita upla nani ra smalki kupia alki taukisa, nahki Gâd ra ai pura suni mayuni bangwaia, Moses laka ba sauhki natkara.
44018014	Pâl mahka aisikan, bara Galio Ju nani ra win: --Naha tanka na bankra diara saura pali aihwa kum daukan kaka lika, yang sip sna man nani Ju nani diara aisamna walaia;
44018015	sakuna naha na, bila nani dukyara, bara nina nani, bara man nani lamka nani dukya ra sa bamna, man nani baha wapni dauks, kan yang want apia sna nahamuna dukya nani laka daukaia.
44018016	Bara baha nani sut la watla wina kangbi sakan.
44018017	Bamna Grîk nani mita sinagog wihtka Sostenis ba alki, wihta tara mawan kat pruki bangwan. Galio baha kaikan, sakuna ai kupia lukras kan.
44018018	Pâl wan muihni nani wal yu ailal Korint ra takaskan. Ningka ra, wan muihni nani ba lakula dauki si, Priska bara Akwila aikuki duri tara ra aimaki Siria tasbaia ra wan. Witin kau duri tara ra aimakras kan bara, Senkriya ra wih ai tawa irban, witin pramis kum daukan ba tnata alkaia.
44018019	Witin nani Epesus taunka ra wan bara, Pâl mita Priska Akwila ba swisi, sinagog ra wan, bara Ju nani baha ra bal asla taki kan nani ra aisi kan.
44018020	Baha nani mita makaban kau yu ailal witin nani wal takaskbia, sakuna witin apia win.
44018021	Bamna witin nani ra lakula daukisi, win: "Dawan helpka ra yang kli bal man nani mai kaikamna." Bara witin duri tara ra aimaki, mahka takan Epesus wina.
44018022	Sesaria ra wan bara, Pâl mita Jerusalem ra wan lalukra nani lakula daukaia ningka ra Antiok ra iwi wan.
44018023	Baha ra yu tila nani luan, ningka ra kli taki impakan plis wala nani ra, Galesha ra bara Pridsia ra sin; bahara iwi kristian nani sut ta baiki kan.
44018024	Baha pyua ra Epesus ra Ju waitna kum balan, ai nina Apolos. Witin ba Aleksandria taunka wina bara smasmalkra sin painkira kan, Ulbanka nani tanka sin kasak kaiki kan.
44018025	Naha waitnika Dawan yabalka tanka sin aitani kat lan takan kan, aitabaiki sin aisi kan, Jisas tanka ba param saki smalki kan, witin Jan Tatahbra tahbi daukanka tanka baman kaiki kan sakuna.
44018026	Apolos lika ai lukanka aiska ni sinagog ra aisi kan. Sakuna Priska Akwila wal baha walan bara, witin nani mita Apolos ba tnayara brisi, kau Dawan yabalka tanka param pali smalkan.
44018027	Bamna Apolos ba Akeya kuntrika ra luaia win bara, Epesus ra lalukra nani mita witin helpka ra wauhkataya kum ulbi Akeya muihni nani ra bliki win, Apolos ba pain bribia. witin Akeya ra wan bara, baha nani Gâd kupia latwanka tara mita kasak luki kan nani ba helpka pali aimakan.
44018028	Bara witin Ju nani mapara aisi ba param pali saki upla nani mawan kat aisi kan. Apolos kasak aisi kan ba mita, Ju nani mita sip diara wiras kan, witin Ulbanka nani wina saki Jisas ba sika Mesaia sa aisi kan bamna.
44019001	Apolos ba Korint ra kan bara, Pâl lika lai il nani tasbaia nani bak impaki ban Epesus ra kat balan. Baha ra kristian tila nani wal prawan.
44019002	Bara baha kristianka nani ra makabi walan: --Man nani pas kasak lukatma bara, Spirit Hulikira ba brisatma ki? Witin nani bila: --Yang nani Spirit Hulikira bara sa sapa tanka sin walras pali.
44019003	Bamna Pâl witin nani ra makabi walan: --Baku kaka, dia sat tahbi daukanka man nani brisatma ki? witin nani bila: --Jan tahbi daukanka ba kat baman.
44019004	Pâl bila: --Jan lika upla tahbi dauki kan wan saurka nani wina wan kupia lakan tanka ba kat, bara Israel uplika nani ra sin win, witin ai nina ra kum aula bara kasak lukbia, bara baha ba sika Jisas.
44019005	Naha walan ba ningkara, sut Dawan Jisas nina ra maki tahbi daukan kan.
44019006	Pâl ai mihta baha nani purara kahban bara, sut purara Spirit Hulikira bal iwan. Bara mahka witin nani bila sat, sat aisin, Dawan sturka sin aisi kan, Gâd wina yan bamna.
44019007	Baha nani sut lika asla 12 waitna kan.
44019008	Pâl lika kati yuhmpa pali Ju nani prias watla ra impaki wih, ai kupia aiska ni smalki, bara aikuki sin aisi kan. Witin upla nani ba kupia lakaia muni kan, Gâd king aimaki laka ba dukya ra.
44019009	Sakuna tila nani ai kupia karna daukan, kasak sin lukan daukras kan, kau ni upla nani mawanra sturi yamni ba mapara saura ni aisin. Bara Pâl baha nani swisi, kristian nani ba Tiranus skulka watla ra brihwan; bahara witin yu bani aisi kan.
44019010	Baha ba dauki kan mani wal prais, bara Esia tasbaia ra iwi nani ba sut Dawan Jisas sturka ba walan, Ju nani bara Ju apia nani sin.
44019011	Bara Gâd mita Pâl bak sain aihka nani ailal pali dauki kan.
44019012	Ban angsar nani sin apia kra kwala wala nani sin witin ra kangban ba, kwalka nani ba siknis uplika nani ra brihwan, bara baha ni siknis uplika nani ba rakan, spirit saura nani ba sin upla nani wina taki kan.
